```css
}

/* –ö–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç */
.overview-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 2rem;
  margin-bottom: 3rem;
}

/* –ë—ã—Å—Ç—Ä—ã–µ –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏—è */
.quick-actions h3,
.recent-activity h3 {
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #00ff88;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.actions-grid {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1rem;
}

  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-radius: 12px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.action-card:hover {
  border-color: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.3);
  background: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.05);
}

.action-link {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 1rem;
  padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
  text-decoration: none;
  color: #ffffff;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.action-icon {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

/* –ü–æ—Å–ª–µ–¥–Ω—è—è –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å */
.activity-list {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1rem;
}

.activity-item {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 1rem;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-radius: 10px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.activity-item:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);

  50% { opacity: 0.5; }
}

/* –ü–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω—ã–µ —Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∏ */
.helpful-links {
  margin-top: 2rem;
}

.helpful-links h3 {
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #00ff88;
  margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.links-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  gap: 1.5rem;
}

.info-card {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
  border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  border-radius: 15px;
  padding: 1.5rem;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.info-card:hover {
  border-color: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.3);
  background: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.05);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.info-card h4 {
  color: #ffffff;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 0.8rem;
}

.info-card p {
  color: #cccccc;
  line-height: 1.6;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.info-card a {
  color: #00ff88;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.info-card a:hover {
  color: #ffffff;
}

/* –ê–¥–∞–ø—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .overview-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 1.5rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .overview-header h2 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }
  
  .stats-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 1rem;
  }
  
  .stat-link {
    padding: 1rem;
  }
  
  .stat-icon {
    font-size: 2rem;
  }
  
  .stat-value {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }
  
  .links-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
  
  .info-card {
    padding: 1rem;
  }
}
```

```javascriptreact
import React, { createContext, useState, useContext, useEffect } from 'react';

export const CartContext = createContext();

export const useCart = () => {
  const context = useContext(CartContext);
  if (!context) {
    throw new Error('useCart –¥–æ–ª–∂–µ–Ω –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ CartProvider');
  }
  return context;
};

export const CartProvider = ({ children }) => {
  const [cartItems, setCartItems] = useState([]);

  // –ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞ –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—ã –∏–∑ localStorage –ø—Ä–∏ –∏–Ω–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏
  useEffect(() => {
    const savedCart = localStorage.getItem('cart');
    if (savedCart) {
      try {
        setCartItems(JSON.parse(savedCart));
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('–û—à–∏–±–∫–∞ –ø—Ä–∏ –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–µ –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—ã:', error);
      }
    }
  }, []);

  // –°–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—ã –≤ localStorage –ø—Ä–∏ –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–∏
  useEffect(() => {
    localStorage.setItem('cart', JSON.stringify(cartItems));
  }, [cartItems]);

  const addToCart = (product, quantity = 1) => {
    setCartItems(prevItems => {
      const existingItem = prevItems.find(item => item.id === product.id);
      
      if (existingItem) {
        return prevItems.map(item =>
          item.id === product.id
            ? { ...item, quantity: item.quantity + quantity }
            : item
        );
      } else {
        return [...prevItems, { ...product, quantity }];
      }
    });
  };

  const removeFromCart = (productId) => {
    setCartItems(prevItems => prevItems.filter(item => item.id !== productId));
  };

  const updateQuantity = (productId, quantity) => {
    if (quantity <= 0) {
      removeFromCart(productId);
      return;
    }

    setCartItems(prevItems =>
      prevItems.map(item =>
        item.id === productId
          ? { ...item, quantity }
          : item
      )
    );
  };

  const clearCart = () => {
    setCartItems([]);
  };

  const getCartTotal = () => {
    return cartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + (item.price * item.quantity), 0);
  };

  const getCartItemsCount = () => {
    return cartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + item.quantity, 0);
  };

  const toggleCart = () => {
    setIsCartOpen(!isCartOpen);
  };

  const value = {
    cartItems,
    addToCart,
    removeFromCart,
    updateQuantity,
    clearCart,
    getCartTotal,
    getCartItemsCount,
    isCartOpen,
    toggleCart,
    setIsCartOpen
  };

  return (
    <CartContext.Provider value={value}>
      {children}
    </CartContext.Provider>
  );
};

```

```javascriptreact
        return prevItems.map(item =>
          item.id === product.id
            ? { ...item, quantity: item.quantity + quantity }
            : item
        );
      } else {
        return [...prevItems, { ...product, quantity }];
      }
    });
  };

  const removeFromCart = (productId) => {
    setCartItems(prevItems => prevItems.filter(item => item.id !== productId));
  };

  const updateQuantity = (productId, quantity) => {
    if (quantity <= 0) {
      removeFromCart(productId);
      return;
    }

    setCartItems(prevItems =>
      prevItems.map(item =>
        item.id === productId
          ? { ...item, quantity }
          : item
      )
    );
  };

  const clearCart = () => {
    setCartItems([]);
  };

  const getCartTotal = () => {
    return cartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + (item.price * item.quantity), 0);
  };

  const getCartItemsCount = () => {
    return cartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + item.quantity, 0);
  };

  const value = {
    cartItems,
    addToCart,
    removeFromCart,
    updateQuantity,
    clearCart,
    getCartTotal,
    getCartItemsCount
  };

  return (
    <CartContext.Provider value={value}>
      {children}
    </CartContext.Provider>
  );
};

```

```javascriptreact
import { StrictMode } from 'react'

import './index.css'

import Home from './pages/Home.jsx'
import CatalogPage from './pages/CatalogPage.jsx'
import ProductPage from './pages/ProductPage.jsx'

  {
    path: "/",
    element: <App />,

        element: <Home />

        path: "catalog",
        element: <CatalogPage />

        path: "product/:id",

      },
      {
        path: "about",

      },

        path: "promotions",

      }

  }
]);

createRoot(document.getElementById('root')).render(
  <StrictMode>
    <CartProvider>
      <RouterProvider router={router} />
    </CartProvider>
  </StrictMode>,
)
```

```javascriptreact
              checked={inStock}
              onChange={e => setInStock(e.target.checked)}
            />
            –¢–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏
          </label>
        </div>

        <div className="catalog-grid">

          {filteredProducts.map(product => (

              <div className="catalog-card-image">
                <span className="catalog-card-icon">{product.icon}</span>
              </div>
              <div className="catalog-card-info">
                <h3>{product.title}</h3>
                <div className="catalog-card-price">{product.price.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</div>
                <div className="catalog-card-meta">
                  <span className="catalog-card-brand">{product.brand}</span>
                  <span className={product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}>
                    {product.available ? <FaCheckCircle /> : <FaTimesCircle />} {product.available ? '–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏' : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
                  </span>
                </div>
                <button 
                  className="catalog-card-btn"
                  onClick={(e) => handleAddToCart(product, e)}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                >
                  <FaShoppingCart /> –í –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É
                </button>
              </div>
            </Link>
          ))}
        </div>
      </main>
    </div>
  );
}
```

```javascriptreact
                <div className="catalog-card-meta">
                  <span className="catalog-card-brand">{product.brand}</span>
                  <span className={product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}>

}
```

```javascriptreact
              value={priceRange[0]}
              onChange={e => setPriceRange([+e.target.value, priceRange[1]])}
            />
            <span>-</span>
            <input
              type="number"
              min={priceRange[0]}
              max={maxPrice}
              value={priceRange[1]}
              onChange={e => setPriceRange([priceRange[0], +e.target.value])}
            />
          </div>
        </div>
        <div className="filter-group">
          <label>
            <input
              type="checkbox"
              checked={inStock}
              onChange={e => setInStock(e.target.checked)}
            />
            –¢–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏
          </label>
        </div>
      </aside>
      <main className="catalog-main">

        <div className="catalog-grid">
          {filteredProducts.length === 0 && <div className="no-products">–ù–µ—Ç —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–æ–≤ –ø–æ –≤—ã–±—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º —Ñ–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä–∞–º</div>}
          {filteredProducts.map(product => (
            <Link to={`/product/${product.id}`} className="catalog-card" key={product.id}>
              <div className="catalog-card-image">
                <span className="catalog-card-icon">{product.icon}</span>
              </div>
              <div className="catalog-card-info">
                <h3>{product.title}</h3>
                <div className="catalog-card-price">{product.price.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</div>
                <div className="catalog-card-meta">
                  <span className="catalog-card-brand">{product.brand}</span>
                  <span className={product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}>
                    {product.available ? <FaCheckCircle /> : <FaTimesCircle />} {product.available ? '–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏' : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
                  </span>
                </div>
                <button 
                  className="catalog-card-btn"
                  onClick={(e) => handleAddToCart(product, e)}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                >
                  <FaShoppingCart /> –í –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É
                </button>
              </div>
            </Link>
          ))}
        </div>
      </main>
    </div>
  );
}
```

```javascriptreact
  },
  {

  }
];

const categories = ['–í—Å–µ', ...Object.keys(categoryStructure)];
const brands = ['–í—Å–µ', '–í–µ–∑–¥–µ—Ö–æ–¥-–ú–∞—Å—Ç–µ—Ä', '–¢–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ú–æ—Ç–æ—Ä', '–°—É–ø–µ—Ä–¢—Ä–µ–∫', 'DrivePro', 'FilterPro', 'LubeMax', 'CoolMax', 'ClutchMax', 'WheelTech', 'LightMax', 'PowerMax', 'WirePro', 'ComfortSeat', 'InstrumentPro'];

export default function Catalog() {
  const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('–í—Å–µ');
  const [selectedSubcategory, setSelectedSubcategory] = useState('–í—Å–µ');
  const [selectedBrand, setSelectedBrand] = useState('–í—Å–µ');
  const [priceRange, setPriceRange] = useState([0, 200000]);
  const [inStock, setInStock] = useState(false);
  const { addToCartWithNotification } = useCartActions();

  const minPrice = 0;
  const maxPrice = 200000;

  // –ü–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –≤—ã–±—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
  const availableSubcategories = selectedCategory === '–í—Å–µ' 
    ? [] 
    : ['–í—Å–µ', ...(categoryStructure[selectedCategory] || [])];

  // –°–±—Ä–æ—Å –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–∏ —Å–º–µ–Ω–µ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
  const handleCategoryChange = (category) => {
    setSelectedCategory(category);
    setSelectedSubcategory('–í—Å–µ');
  };

    const byBrand = selectedBrand === '–í—Å–µ' || product.brand === selectedBrand;
    const byPrice = product.price >= priceRange[0] && product.price <= priceRange[1];
    const byStock = !inStock || product.available;
    return byCategory && bySubcategory && byBrand && byPrice && byStock;
  });

  const handleAddToCart = (product, e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    e.stopPropagation();
    addToCartWithNotification(product, 1);
  };

            ))}

            <span>-</span>
            <input
              type="number"
              min={priceRange[0]}
              max={maxPrice}

              type="checkbox"
              checked={inStock}
              onChange={e => setInStock(e.target.checked)}
            />
            –¢–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏
          </label>
        </div>

      <main className="catalog-main">

          {filteredProducts.map(product => (
            <Link to={`/product/${product.id}`} className="catalog-card" key={product.id}>

                  </span>

                <button
```

–Ø —Ä–∞—Å—à–∏—Ä–∏–ª –∫–∞—Ç–∞–ª–æ–≥ —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–æ–≤ —Å **–ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Ü–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–æ–π –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–π –∏ –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–π**:

### üóÇÔ∏è **–î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏:**
1. **–î–≤–∏–≥–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å**
   - –û—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–µ —É–∑–ª—ã

2. **–¢—Ä–∞–Ω—Å–º–∏—Å—Å–∏—è**
   - –ö–æ—Ä–æ–±–∫–∞ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥–∞—á
   - –ü—Ä–∏–≤–æ–¥—ã

   - –î–∏—Ñ—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∞–ª

3. **–•–æ–¥–æ–≤–∞—è —á–∞—Å—Ç—å**
   - –ì—É—Å–µ–Ω–∏—Ü—ã
   - –ü–æ–¥–≤–µ—Å–∫–∞

```javascriptreact
    'FilterPro', 'LubeMax', 'CoolMax', 'ClutchMax', 'WheelTech', 
    'LightMax', 'PowerMax', 'WirePro', 'ComfortSeat', 'InstrumentPro'
  ]
};

export const AdminDataProvider = ({ children }) => {
  const [data, setData] = useState(() => {
    // –ó–∞–≥—Ä—É–∂–∞–µ–º –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –∏–∑ localStorage –∏–ª–∏ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ
    const savedData = localStorage.getItem('adminData');
    return savedData ? JSON.parse(savedData) : initialData;
  });

  // –°–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω—è–µ–º –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –≤ localStorage –ø—Ä–∏ –∫–∞–∂–¥–æ–º –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–∏
  useEffect(() => {
    localStorage.setItem('adminData', JSON.stringify(data));
  }, [data]);

  // –ö–ê–¢–ï–ì–û–†–ò–ò
  const addCategory = (categoryName) => {
    setData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      categoryStructure: {
        ...prev.categoryStructure,
        [categoryName]: []
      }
    }));
  };

  const updateCategory = (oldName, newName) => {
    setData(prev => {
      const newStructure = { ...prev.categoryStructure };
      newStructure[newName] = newStructure[oldName];
      delete newStructure[oldName];
      
      // –û–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª—è–µ–º –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –≤ —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–∞—Ö
      const updatedProducts = prev.products.map(product => 
        product.category === oldName 
          ? { ...product, category: newName }
          : product
      );

      return {
        ...prev,
        categoryStructure: newStructure,
        products: updatedProducts
      };
    });
  };

  const deleteCategory = (categoryName) => {
    setData(prev => {
      const newStructure = { ...prev.categoryStructure };
      delete newStructure[categoryName];
      
      // –£–¥–∞–ª—è–µ–º —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä—ã —ç—Ç–æ–π –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
      const filteredProducts = prev.products.filter(product => 
        product.category !== categoryName
      );

      return {
        ...prev,
        categoryStructure: newStructure,
        products: filteredProducts
      };
    });
  };

  const addSubcategory = (categoryName, subcategoryName) => {
    setData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      categoryStructure: {
        ...prev.categoryStructure,
        [categoryName]: [...(prev.categoryStructure[categoryName] || []), subcategoryName]
      }
    }));
  };

  const updateSubcategory = (categoryName, oldSubName, newSubName) => {
    setData(prev => {
      const updatedStructure = {
        ...prev.categoryStructure,
        [categoryName]: prev.categoryStructure[categoryName].map(sub => 
          sub === oldSubName ? newSubName : sub
        )
      };

      // –û–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª—è–µ–º –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –≤ —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–∞—Ö
      const updatedProducts = prev.products.map(product => 
        product.category === categoryName && product.subcategory === oldSubName
          ? { ...product, subcategory: newSubName }
          : product
      );

      return {
        ...prev,
        categoryStructure: updatedStructure,
        products: updatedProducts
      };
    });
  };

  const deleteSubcategory = (categoryName, subcategoryName) => {
    setData(prev => {
      const updatedStructure = {
        ...prev.categoryStructure,
        [categoryName]: prev.categoryStructure[categoryName].filter(sub => 
          sub !== subcategoryName
        )
      };

      // –£–¥–∞–ª—è–µ–º —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä—ã —ç—Ç–æ–π –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
      const filteredProducts = prev.products.filter(product => 
        !(product.category === categoryName && product.subcategory === subcategoryName)
      );

      return {
        ...prev,
        categoryStructure: updatedStructure,
        products: filteredProducts
      };
    });
  };

  // –¢–û–í–ê–†–´
  const addProduct = (product) => {
    const newProduct = {
      ...product,
      id: Date.now() // –ü—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ–π —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–± –≥–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∞—Ü–∏–∏ ID
    };
    setData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      products: [...prev.products, newProduct]
    }));
    return newProduct;
  };

  const updateProduct = (productId, updates) => {
    setData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      products: prev.products.map(product => 
        product.id === productId 
          ? { ...product, ...updates }
          : product
      )
    }));
  };

  const deleteProduct = (productId) => {
    setData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      products: prev.products.filter(product => product.id !== productId)
    }));
  };

  // –ê–ö–¶–ò–ò
  const addPromotion = (promotion) => {
    const newPromotion = {
      ...promotion,
      id: Date.now()
    };
    setData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      promotions: [...prev.promotions, newPromotion]
    }));
    return newPromotion;
  };

  const updatePromotion = (promotionId, updates) => {
    setData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      promotions: prev.promotions.map(promotion => 
        promotion.id === promotionId 
          ? { ...promotion, ...updates }
          : promotion
      )
    }));
  };

  const deletePromotion = (promotionId) => {
    setData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      promotions: prev.promotions.filter(promotion => promotion.id !== promotionId)
    }));
  };

  // –ò–ù–§–û–†–ú–ê–¶–ò–Ø –û –ö–û–ú–ü–ê–ù–ò–ò
  const updateCompanyInfo = (updates) => {
    setData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      companyInfo: { ...prev.companyInfo, ...updates }
    }));
  };

  const value = {
    data,
    // –ö–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
    addCategory,
    updateCategory,
    deleteCategory,
    addSubcategory,
    updateSubcategory,
    deleteSubcategory,
    // –¢–æ–≤–∞—Ä—ã
    addProduct,
    updateProduct,
    deleteProduct,
    // –ê–∫—Ü–∏–∏
    addPromotion,
    updatePromotion,
    deletePromotion,
    // –ò–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è –æ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏
    updateCompanyInfo
  };

  return (
    <AdminDataContext.Provider value={value}>
      {children}
    </AdminDataContext.Provider>
  );
};
```

```javascriptreact
import { StrictMode } from 'react'
import { createRoot } from 'react-dom/client'
import { createBrowserRouter, RouterProvider } from 'react-router-dom'
import './index.css'
import App from './App.jsx'
import Home from './pages/Home.jsx'
import CatalogPage from './pages/CatalogPage.jsx'
import ProductPage from './pages/ProductPage.jsx'
import Cart from './pages/Cart.jsx'
import About from './pages/About.jsx'
import Promotions from './pages/Promotions.jsx'
import SimpleAdminLogin from './pages/admin/SimpleAdminLogin.jsx'
import SimpleAdminDashboard from './pages/admin/SimpleAdminDashboard.jsx'
import { CartProvider } from './context/CartContext.jsx'
import { AdminDataProvider } from './context/AdminDataContext.jsx'

const router = createBrowserRouter([
  {
    path: "/",
    element: <App />,
    children: [
      {
        index: true,
        element: <Home />
      },
      {
        path: "catalog",
        element: <CatalogPage />
      },
      {
        path: "product/:id",
        element: <ProductPage />
      },
      {
        path: "cart",
        element: <Cart />
      },
      {
        path: "about",
        element: <About />
      },
      {
        path: "promotions",
        element: <Promotions />
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    path: "/admin",
    element: <SimpleAdminLogin />
  },
  {
    path: "/admin/dashboard",
    element: <SimpleAdminDashboard />
  }
]);

createRoot(document.getElementById('root')).render(
  <StrictMode>
    <CartProvider>
      <RouterProvider router={router} />
    </CartProvider>
  </StrictMode>,
)
```

```javascriptreact
  const categoryStructure = data.categoryStructure;
```

```javascriptreact
  const categories = ['–í—Å–µ', ...Object.keys(categoryStructure)];
  const brands = ['–í—Å–µ', ...data.brands];

  const minPrice = 0;
  const maxPrice = 200000;

  // –ü–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –≤—ã–±—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
  const availableSubcategories = selectedCategory === '–í—Å–µ' 
    ? [] 
    : ['–í—Å–µ', ...(categoryStructure[selectedCategory] || [])];

  // –°–±—Ä–æ—Å –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–∏ —Å–º–µ–Ω–µ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
  const handleCategoryChange = (category) => {
    setSelectedCategory(category);
    setSelectedSubcategory('–í—Å–µ');
  };

  const filteredProducts = products.filter((product) => {
    const byCategory = selectedCategory === '–í—Å–µ' || product.category === selectedCategory;
    const bySubcategory = selectedSubcategory === '–í—Å–µ' || product.subcategory === selectedSubcategory;
    const byBrand = selectedBrand === '–í—Å–µ' || product.brand === selectedBrand;
    const byPrice = product.price >= priceRange[0] && product.price <= priceRange[1];
    const byStock = !inStock || product.available;
    return byCategory && bySubcategory && byBrand && byPrice && byStock;
  });

  const handleAddToCart = (product, e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    e.stopPropagation();
    addToCartWithNotification(product, 1);
  };

  return (
    <div className="catalog-wrapper">
      <aside className="catalog-filters">
        <h3>–§–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä—ã</h3>
        <div className="filter-group">
          <label>–ö–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—è</label>
          <select value={selectedCategory} onChange={e => handleCategoryChange(e.target.value)}>
            {categories.map(cat => (
              <option key={cat} value={cat}>{cat}</option>
            ))}
          </select>
        </div>
        {availableSubcategories.length > 0 && (
          <div className="filter-group">
            <label>–ü–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—è</label>
            <select value={selectedSubcategory} onChange={e => setSelectedSubcategory(e.target.value)}>
              {availableSubcategories.map(subcat => (
                <option key={subcat} value={subcat}>{subcat}</option>
              ))}
            </select>
          </div>
        )}
        <div className="filter-group">
          <label>–ü—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å</label>
          <select value={selectedBrand} onChange={e => setSelectedBrand(e.target.value)}>
            {brands.map(brand => (
              <option key={brand} value={brand}>{brand}</option>
            ))}
          </select>
        </div>
        <div className="filter-group">
          <label>–¶–µ–Ω–∞, ‚ÇΩ</label>
          <div className="price-range">
            <input
              type="number"
              min={minPrice}
              max={priceRange[1]}
              value={priceRange[0]}
              onChange={e => setPriceRange([+e.target.value, priceRange[1]])}
            />
            <span>-</span>
            <input
              type="number"
              min={priceRange[0]}
              max={maxPrice}
              value={priceRange[1]}
              onChange={e => setPriceRange([priceRange[0], +e.target.value])}
            />
          </div>
        </div>
        <div className="filter-group">
          <label>
            <input
              type="checkbox"
              checked={inStock}
              onChange={e => setInStock(e.target.checked)}
            />
            –¢–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏
          </label>
        </div>
      </aside>
      <main className="catalog-main">
        <h2>–ö–∞—Ç–∞–ª–æ–≥ —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–æ–≤</h2>
        <div className="catalog-grid">
          {filteredProducts.length === 0 && <div className="no-products">–ù–µ—Ç —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–æ–≤ –ø–æ –≤—ã–±—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º —Ñ–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä–∞–º</div>}
          {filteredProducts.map(product => (
            <Link to={`/product/${product.id}`} className="catalog-card" key={product.id}>
              <div className="catalog-card-image">
                <span className="catalog-card-icon">{product.icon}</span>
              </div>
              <div className="catalog-card-info">
                <h3>{product.title}</h3>
                <div className="catalog-card-price">{product.price.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</div>
                <div className="catalog-card-category">
                  <span className="category">{product.category}</span>
                  {product.subcategory && <span className="subcategory"> ‚Üí {product.subcategory}</span>}
                </div>
                <div className="catalog-card-meta">
                  <span className="catalog-card-brand">{product.brand}</span>
                  <span className={product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}>
                    {product.available ? <FaCheckCircle /> : <FaTimesCircle />} {product.available ? '–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏' : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
                  </span>
                </div>
                <button 
                  className="catalog-card-btn"
                  onClick={(e) => handleAddToCart(product, e)}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                >
                  <FaShoppingCart /> –í –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É
                </button>
              </div>
            </Link>
          ))}
        </div>
      </main>
    </div>
  );
}
```

```javascriptreact
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useNavigate, Outlet, Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom';
import { 
  FaBox, 
  FaPercent, 
  FaFileAlt, 
  FaUsers,
  FaChartLine,
  FaSignOutAlt,
  FaBars,
  FaTimes,
  FaHome,
  FaTags,
  FaCog
} from 'react-icons/fa';
import './AdvancedAdminDashboard.css';

function AdvancedAdminDashboard() {
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const location = useLocation();
  const [isSidebarOpen, setIsSidebarOpen] = useState(true);

  useEffect(() => {
    const isAuth = localStorage.getItem('adminAuth');
    if (!isAuth) {
      navigate('/admin');
    }
  }, [navigate]);

  const handleLogout = () => {
    localStorage.removeItem('adminAuth');
    navigate('/admin');
  };

  const menuItems = [
    {
      path: '/admin/dashboard',
      icon: <FaChartLine />,
      label: '–û–±–∑–æ—Ä',
      exact: true
    },
    {
      path: '/admin/dashboard/categories',
      icon: <FaTags />,
      label: '–ö–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏'
    },
    {
      path: '/admin/dashboard/products',
      icon: <FaBox />,
      label: '–¢–æ–≤–∞—Ä—ã'
    },
    {
      path: '/admin/dashboard/promotions',
      icon: <FaPercent />,
      label: '–ê–∫—Ü–∏–∏'
    },
    {
      path: '/admin/dashboard/content',
      icon: <FaFileAlt />,
      label: '–û –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏'
    },
    {
      path: '/admin/dashboard/orders',
      icon: <FaUsers />,
      label: '–ó–∞–∫–∞–∑—ã'
    },
    {
      path: '/admin/dashboard/settings',
      icon: <FaCog />,
      label: '–ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∏'
    }
  ];

  const isActiveLink = (path, exact = false) => {
    if (exact) {
      return location.pathname === path;
    }
    return location.pathname.startsWith(path);
  };

  const getCurrentPageTitle = () => {
    const currentItem = menuItems.find(item => 
      item.exact 
        ? location.pathname === item.path
        : location.pathname.startsWith(item.path)
    );
    return currentItem ? currentItem.label : '–ê–¥–º–∏–Ω –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å';
  };

  return (
    <div className="advanced-admin-dashboard">
      {/* Sidebar */}
      <div className={`admin-sidebar ${isSidebarOpen ? 'open' : 'closed'}`}>
        <div className="sidebar-header">
          <div className="brand">
            <FaHome />
            <span>–ê–¥–º–∏–Ω –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å</span>
          </div>
          <button 
            className="sidebar-toggle desktop"
            onClick={() => setIsSidebarOpen(!isSidebarOpen)}
          >
            {isSidebarOpen ? <FaTimes /> : <FaBars />}
          </button>
        </div>

        <nav className="sidebar-nav">
          {menuItems.map((item) => (
            <Link
              key={item.path}
              to={item.path}
              className={`nav-item ${isActiveLink(item.path, item.exact) ? 'active' : ''}`}
              title={item.label}
            >
              <span className="nav-icon">{item.icon}</span>
              <span className="nav-label">{item.label}</span>
            </Link>
          ))}
        </nav>

        <div className="sidebar-footer">
          <Link to="/" className="site-link">
            <FaHome />
            <span>–ù–∞ —Å–∞–π—Ç</span>
          </Link>
          <button className="logout-btn" onClick={handleLogout}>
            <FaSignOutAlt />
            <span>–í—ã–π—Ç–∏</span>
          </button>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Main Content */}
      <div className={`admin-main ${isSidebarOpen ? 'sidebar-open' : 'sidebar-closed'}`}>
        <header className="admin-header">
          <div className="header-left">
            <button 
              className="sidebar-toggle mobile"
              onClick={() => setIsSidebarOpen(!isSidebarOpen)}
            >
              <FaBars />
            </button>
            <h1>{getCurrentPageTitle()}</h1>
          </div>
          
          <div className="header-actions">
            <Link to="/" className="site-link">
              <FaHome /> –ù–∞ —Å–∞–π—Ç
            </Link>
            <button className="logout-btn-header" onClick={handleLogout}>
              <FaSignOutAlt />
            </button>
          </div>
        </header>

        <main className="admin-content">
          <Outlet />
        </main>
      </div>

      {/* Mobile Overlay */}
      {isSidebarOpen && (
        <div 
          className="sidebar-overlay mobile"
          onClick={() => setIsSidebarOpen(false)}
        />
      )}
    </div>
  );
}

export default AdvancedAdminDashboard;
```

```css
/* Advanced Admin Dashboard */
.advanced-admin-dashboard {
  display: flex;
  min-height: 100vh;
  background: #0a0a0a;
  color: #ffffff;
}

/* Sidebar */
.admin-sidebar {
  width: 280px;
  background: #1a1a1a;
  border-right: 1px solid #333;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  position: fixed;
  height: 100vh;
  z-index: 1000;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.admin-sidebar.closed {
  width: 80px;
}

.admin-sidebar.closed .nav-label,
.admin-sidebar.closed .brand span,
.admin-sidebar.closed .site-link span,
.admin-sidebar.closed .logout-btn span {
  opacity: 0;
  visibility: hidden;
}

.sidebar-header {
  padding: 20px;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #333;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
}

.brand {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
  color: #00ff88;

  font-size: 1.2rem;
}

  transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
}

.sidebar-toggle {

  font-size: 1.2rem;

  padding: 8px;

  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.sidebar-toggle:hover {

}

.sidebar-toggle.mobile {

}

/* Navigation */
.sidebar-nav {

  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 4px;
}

.nav-item {
  display: flex;

}

.nav-item:hover {

  border-left-color: #00ff88;
}

.nav-item.active {
  background: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.1);
  color: #00ff88;

.nav-icon {

/* Sidebar Footer */
.sidebar-footer {
  padding: 20px;

.site-link,
.logout-btn {

}

.site-link:hover {
  color: #00ff88;
}

.logout-btn:hover {
  color: #ff4444;
}

.site-link span,
.logout-btn span {
  transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
}

/* Main Content */
.admin-main {
  flex: 1;
  margin-left: 280px;
  transition: margin-left 0.3s ease;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  min-height: 100vh;
}

.admin-main.sidebar-closed {
  margin-left: 80px;
}

/* Header */
.admin-header {
  background: #1a1a1a;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #333;
  padding: 16px 24px;

  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;

  gap: 16px;

.header-left h1 {
  font-size: 1.5rem;

.header-actions {
  display: flex;

  gap: 16px;
}

.site-link {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
  color: #00ff88;

  font-weight: 500;

  background: #ff4444;

/* Content */

/* Mobile Responsiveness */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .admin-sidebar {
    transform: translateX(-100%);
    width: 280px;
  }
  
  .admin-sidebar.open {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  
  .admin-main {
    margin-left: 0;
  }
  
  .admin-main.sidebar-open {
    margin-left: 0;
  }
  
  .sidebar-toggle.desktop {
    display: none;
  }
  
  .sidebar-toggle.mobile {
    display: block;
  }
  
  .sidebar-overlay.mobile {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    z-index: 999;
  }
  
  .header-actions .site-link {
    display: none;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .admin-content {
    padding: 16px;
  }
  
  .admin-header {
    padding: 12px 16px;
  }
  
  .header-left h1 {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
  }
}

/* Smooth transitions */
* {
  transition: margin-left 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease, opacity 0.3s ease;
}
```

```javascriptreact
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { 
  FaPlus, 
  FaEdit, 
  FaTrash, 
  FaSave, 
  FaTimes,
  FaTags,
  FaList
} from 'react-icons/fa';
import { useAdminData } from '../../context/AdminDataContext';
import './CategoryManagement.css';

function CategoryManagement() {
  const { 
    data, 
    addCategory, 
    updateCategory, 
    deleteCategory,
    addSubcategory,
    updateSubcategory,
    deleteSubcategory
  } = useAdminData();

  const [newCategoryName, setNewCategoryName] = useState('');
  const [editingCategory, setEditingCategory] = useState(null);
  const [editCategoryName, setEditCategoryName] = useState('');
  
  const [newSubcategoryName, setNewSubcategoryName] = useState('');
  const [editingSubcategory, setEditingSubcategory] = useState(null);
  const [editSubcategoryName, setEditSubcategoryName] = useState('');
  const [selectedCategoryForSub, setSelectedCategoryForSub] = useState('');

  // –î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
  const handleAddCategory = () => {
    if (newCategoryName.trim()) {
      addCategory(newCategoryName.trim());
      setNewCategoryName('');
    }
  };

  // –ù–∞—á–∞—Ç—å —Ä–µ–¥–∞–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
  const startEditCategory = (categoryName) => {
    setEditingCategory(categoryName);
    setEditCategoryName(categoryName);
  };

  // –°–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ç—å –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
  const saveEditCategory = () => {
    if (editCategoryName.trim() && editCategoryName !== editingCategory) {
      updateCategory(editingCategory, editCategoryName.trim());
    }
    setEditingCategory(null);
    setEditCategoryName('');
  };

  // –û—Ç–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å —Ä–µ–¥–∞–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
  const cancelEditCategory = () => {
    setEditingCategory(null);
    setEditCategoryName('');
  };

  // –£–¥–∞–ª–∏—Ç—å –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—é
  const handleDeleteCategory = (categoryName) => {
    if (confirm(`–£–¥–∞–ª–∏—Ç—å –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—é "${categoryName}" –∏ –≤—Å–µ –µ—ë —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä—ã?`)) {
      deleteCategory(categoryName);
    }
  };

  // –î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
  const handleAddSubcategory = () => {
    if (newSubcategoryName.trim() && selectedCategoryForSub) {
      addSubcategory(selectedCategoryForSub, newSubcategoryName.trim());
      setNewSubcategoryName('');
    }
  };

  // –ù–∞—á–∞—Ç—å —Ä–µ–¥–∞–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
  const startEditSubcategory = (categoryName, subcategoryName) => {
    setEditingSubcategory(`${categoryName}::${subcategoryName}`);
    setEditSubcategoryName(subcategoryName);
  };

  // –°–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ç—å –∏–∑–º–µ–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
  const saveEditSubcategory = () => {
    const [categoryName, oldSubName] = editingSubcategory.split('::');
    if (editSubcategoryName.trim() && editSubcategoryName !== oldSubName) {
      updateSubcategory(categoryName, oldSubName, editSubcategoryName.trim());
    }
    setEditingSubcategory(null);
    setEditSubcategoryName('');
  };

  // –û—Ç–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å —Ä–µ–¥–∞–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
  const cancelEditSubcategory = () => {
    setEditingSubcategory(null);
    setEditSubcategoryName('');
  };

  // –£–¥–∞–ª–∏—Ç—å –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—é
  const handleDeleteSubcategory = (categoryName, subcategoryName) => {
    if (confirm(`–£–¥–∞–ª–∏—Ç—å –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—é "${subcategoryName}" –∏ –≤—Å–µ –µ—ë —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä—ã?`)) {
      deleteSubcategory(categoryName, subcategoryName);
    }
  };

  return (
    <div className="category-management">
      <div className="page-header">
        <h2>
          <FaTags /> –£–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—è–º–∏
        </h2>
        <p>–î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª—è–π—Ç–µ, —Ä–µ–¥–∞–∫—Ç–∏—Ä—É–π—Ç–µ –∏ —É–¥–∞–ª—è–π—Ç–µ –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏ —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–æ–≤</p>
      </div>

      <div className="category-content">
        {/* –î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏ */}
        <div className="section">
          <h3>
            <FaPlus /> –î–æ–±–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—é
          </h3>
          <div className="add-category-form">
            <input
              type="text"
              placeholder="–ù–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏"
              value={newCategoryName}
              onChange={(e) => setNewCategoryName(e.target.value)}
              onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleAddCategory()}
            />
            <button 
              onClick={handleAddCategory}
              disabled={!newCategoryName.trim()}
              className="add-btn"
            >
              <FaPlus /> –î–æ–±–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* –°–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–π */}
        <div className="section">
          <h3>
            <FaList /> –ö–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏ ({Object.keys(data.categoryStructure).length})
          </h3>
          <div className="categories-list">
            {Object.entries(data.categoryStructure).map(([categoryName, subcategories]) => (
              <div key={categoryName} className="category-item">
                <div className="category-header">
                  <div className="category-info">
                    {editingCategory === categoryName ? (
                      <div className="edit-form">
                        <input
                          type="text"
                          value={editCategoryName}
                          onChange={(e) => setEditCategoryName(e.target.value)}
                          onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && saveEditCategory()}
                          autoFocus
                        />
                        <button onClick={saveEditCategory} className="save-btn">
                          <FaSave />
                        </button>
                        <button onClick={cancelEditCategory} className="cancel-btn">
                          <FaTimes />
                        </button>
                      </div>
                    ) : (
                      <>
                        <h4>{categoryName}</h4>
                        <span className="subcategory-count">
                          {subcategories.length} –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–π
                        </span>
                      </>
                    )}
                  </div>
                  
                  {editingCategory !== categoryName && (
                    <div className="category-actions">
                      <button 
                        onClick={() => startEditCategory(categoryName)}
                        className="edit-btn"
                        title="–†–µ–¥–∞–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å"
                      >
                        <FaEdit />
                      </button>
                      <button 
                        onClick={() => handleDeleteCategory(categoryName)}
                        className="delete-btn"
                        title="–£–¥–∞–ª–∏—Ç—å"
                      >
                        <FaTrash />
                      </button>
                    </div>
                  )}
                </div>

                {/* –ü–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏ */}
                <div className="subcategories">
                  {subcategories.map((subcategoryName) => (
                    <div key={subcategoryName} className="subcategory-item">
                      {editingSubcategory === `${categoryName}::${subcategoryName}` ? (
                        <div className="edit-form">
                          <input
                            type="text"
                            value={editSubcategoryName}
                            onChange={(e) => setEditSubcategoryName(e.target.value)}
                            onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && saveEditSubcategory()}
                            autoFocus
                          />
                          <button onClick={saveEditSubcategory} className="save-btn">
                            <FaSave />
                          </button>
                          <button onClick={cancelEditSubcategory} className="cancel-btn">
                            <FaTimes />
                          </button>
                        </div>
                      ) : (
                        <>
                          <span className="subcategory-name">{subcategoryName}</span>
                          <div className="subcategory-actions">
                            <button 
                              onClick={() => startEditSubcategory(categoryName, subcategoryName)}
                              className="edit-btn"
                              title="–†–µ–¥–∞–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å"
                            >
                              <FaEdit />
                            </button>
                            <button 
                              onClick={() => handleDeleteSubcategory(categoryName, subcategoryName)}
                              className="delete-btn"
                              title="–£–¥–∞–ª–∏—Ç—å"
                            >
                              <FaTrash />
                            </button>
                          </div>
                        </>
                      )}
                    </div>
                  ))}
                </div>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* –î–æ–±–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏ */}
        <div className="section">
          <h3>
            <FaPlus /> –î–æ–±–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—é
          </h3>
          <div className="add-subcategory-form">
            <select
              value={selectedCategoryForSub}
              onChange={(e) => setSelectedCategoryForSub(e.target.value)}
            >
              <option value="">–í—ã–±–µ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—é</option>
              {Object.keys(data.categoryStructure).map(categoryName => (
                <option key={categoryName} value={categoryName}>
                  {categoryName}
                </option>
              ))}
            </select>
            <input
              type="text"
              placeholder="–ù–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏"
              value={newSubcategoryName}
              onChange={(e) => setNewSubcategoryName(e.target.value)}
              onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleAddSubcategory()}
            />
            <button 
              onClick={handleAddSubcategory}
              disabled={!newSubcategoryName.trim() || !selectedCategoryForSub}
              className="add-btn"
            >
              <FaPlus /> –î–æ–±–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

export default CategoryManagement;
```

```css
/* Category Management */
.category-management {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.page-header {
  margin-bottom: 32px;
}

.page-header h2 {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  color: #ffffff;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.page-header p {
  color: #ccc;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  margin: 0;
}

.category-content {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 32px;
}

/* Sections */
.section {
  background: #1a1a1a;
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 24px;
  border: 1px solid #333;
}

.section h3 {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
  color: #00ff88;
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* Add Category Form */
.add-category-form {
  display: flex;
  gap: 12px;
  align-items: center;
}

.add-category-form input {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  background: #252525;
  border: 1px solid #444;
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 1rem;
  outline: none;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.add-category-form input:focus {
  border-color: #00ff88;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.1);
}

.add-btn {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
  padding: 12px 20px;
  background: #00ff88;
  color: #000;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-weight: 600;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.add-btn:hover:not(:disabled) {
  background: #00e67a;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.add-btn:disabled {
  background: #666;
  color: #999;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  transform: none;
}

/* Categories List */
.categories-list {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 20px;
}

.category-item {
  background: #252525;
  border-radius: 10px;
  border: 1px solid #333;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.category-header {
  display: flex;

  background: #2a2a2a;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #333;
}

.category-info h4 {
  color: #fff;

}

.subcategory-count {
  color: #00ff88;

  font-weight: 500;
}

.category-actions,
.subcategory-actions {
  display: flex;
  gap: 8px;
}

.edit-btn,
.delete-btn,
.save-btn,
.cancel-btn {
  padding: 8px 12px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 6px;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

.edit-btn {
  background: #2196f3;
  color: white;
}

.edit-btn:hover {
  background: #1976d2;
}

.delete-btn {
  background: #ff4444;
  color: white;
}

.delete-btn:hover {
  background: #ff3333;
}

.save-btn {
  background: #00ff88;

}

.save-btn:hover {

.cancel-btn {
  background: #666;

}

.cancel-btn:hover {
  background: #555;
}

/* Subcategories */
.subcategories {
  padding: 20px 24px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 12px;
}

.subcategory-item {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  background: #1a1a1a;

}

.subcategory-name {

}

/* Edit Forms */
.edit-form {

  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;

}

.edit-form input {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 8px 12px;

  border: 1px solid #555;
  border-radius: 6px;
  color: #fff;

}

.edit-form input:focus {
  border-color: #00ff88;
}

/* Add Subcategory Form */
.add-subcategory-form {
  display: flex;
  gap: 12px;
  align-items: center;
}

.add-subcategory-form select {
  padding: 12px 16px;
  background: #252525;
  border: 1px solid #444;
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 1rem;
  outline: none;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  min-width: 200px;
}

.add-subcategory-form select:focus {
  border-color: #00ff88;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.1);
}

.add-subcategory-form input {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  background: #252525;
  border: 1px solid #444;
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 1rem;
  outline: none;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.add-subcategory-form input:focus {
  border-color: #00ff88;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.1);
}

/* Responsive */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .add-category-form,
  .add-subcategory-form {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
  }
  
  .category-header {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
    gap: 12px;
  }
  
  .category-actions {
    align-self: flex-end;
  }
  
  .subcategory-item {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
    gap: 8px;
  }
  
  .subcategory-actions {
    align-self: flex-end;
  }
  
  .edit-form {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
    gap: 8px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .section {
    padding: 16px;
  }
  
  .page-header h2 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }
  
  .category-header {
    padding: 16px;
  }
  
  .subcategories {
    padding: 16px;
  }
}
```

```css
/* Admin Overview Advanced */
.admin-overview-advanced {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.overview-header {
  margin-bottom: 32px;
}

.overview-header h2 {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  color: #ffffff;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.overview-header p {
  color: #ccc;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  margin: 0;
}

/* Stats Grid */
.stats-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
  gap: 20px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.stat-card {
  background: #1a1a1a;
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 24px;
  border: 1px solid #333;
  text-decoration: none;
  color: inherit;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 20px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.stat-card::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 3px;
  background: var(--stat-color);
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
}

.stat-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-4px);
  border-color: var(--stat-color);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

.stat-card:hover::before {
  opacity: 1;
}

.stat-icon {
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  width: 60px;
  height: 60px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
  border-radius: 12px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.stat-info {
  flex: 1;
}

.stat-value {
  font-size: 2.2rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #fff;
  margin-bottom: 4px;
}

.stat-label {
  color: #ccc;
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* Overview Content */
.overview-content {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
  gap: 32px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.quick-actions,
.recent-activity {
  background: #1a1a1a;
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 24px;
  border: 1px solid #333;
}

.quick-actions h3,
.recent-activity h3 {
  color: #00ff88;
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* Quick Actions */
.actions-grid {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 12px;
}

.action-card {
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.action-link {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  background: #252525;
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: #ccc;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  border: 1px solid #333;
}

.action-link:hover {
  background: #2a2a2a;
  transform: translateX(4px);
  border-color: #555;
}

.action-icon {
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  width: 24px;
  text-align: center;
}

/* Recent Activity */
.activity-list {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 16px;
}

.activity-item {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 16px;
  padding: 16px;
  background: #252525;
  border-radius: 8px;
  border: 1px solid #333;
}

.activity-info {
  flex: 1;
}

.activity-message {
  color: #fff;
  font-weight: 500;
  margin-bottom: 4px;
}

.activity-time {
  color: #888;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.activity-status {
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  width: 32px;
  text-align: center;
}

/* Helpful Links */
.helpful-links {
  background: #1a1a1a;
  border-radius: 12px;
  padding: 24px;
  border: 1px solid #333;
}

.helpful-links h3 {
  color: #00ff88;
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.links-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
  gap: 20px;
}

.info-card {
  background: #252525;
  border-radius: 10px;
  padding: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #333;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.info-card:hover {
  background: #2a2a2a;
  border-color: #555;
  transform: translateY(-2px);
}

.info-card h4 {
  color: #00ff88;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.info-card p {
  color: #ccc;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
  margin-bottom: 12px;
  line-height: 1.5;
}

.info-card a {
  color: #00ff88;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.info-card a:hover {
  color: #00e67a;
}

/* Responsive */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .stats-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 16px;
  }
  
  .overview-content {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 24px;
  }
  
  .links-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 16px;
  }
  
  .stat-card {
    padding: 20px;
    gap: 16px;
  }
  
  .stat-icon {
    font-size: 2rem;
    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
  }
  
  .stat-value {
    font-size: 1.8rem;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .admin-overview-advanced {
    padding: 0;
  }
  
  .overview-header h2 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }
  
  .quick-actions,
  .recent-activity,
  .helpful-links {
    padding: 16px;
  }
  
  .stat-card {
    padding: 16px;
    gap: 12px;
  }
  
  .activity-item {
    padding: 12px;
  }
  
  .info-card {
    padding: 16px;
  }
}
```

```javascriptreact
import { StrictMode } from 'react'
import { createRoot } from 'react-dom/client'
import { createBrowserRouter, RouterProvider } from 'react-router-dom'
import './index.css'
import App from './App.jsx'
import Home from './pages/Home.jsx'
import CatalogPage from './pages/CatalogPage.jsx'
import ProductPage from './pages/ProductPage.jsx'
import Cart from './pages/Cart.jsx'
import About from './pages/About.jsx'
import Promotions from './pages/Promotions.jsx'
import SimpleAdminLogin from './pages/admin/SimpleAdminLogin.jsx'
import AdvancedAdminDashboard from './pages/admin/AdvancedAdminDashboard.jsx'
import AdminOverviewAdvanced from './pages/admin/AdminOverviewAdvanced.jsx'
import CategoryManagement from './pages/admin/CategoryManagement.jsx'
import { CartProvider } from './context/CartContext.jsx'
import { AdminDataProvider } from './context/AdminDataContext.jsx'

const router = createBrowserRouter([
  {
    path: "/",
    element: <App />,
    children: [
      {
        index: true,
        element: <Home />
      },
      {
        path: "catalog",
        element: <CatalogPage />
      },
      {
        path: "product/:id",
        element: <ProductPage />
      },
      {
        path: "cart",
        element: <Cart />
      },
      {
        path: "about",
        element: <About />
      },
      {
        path: "promotions",
        element: <Promotions />
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    path: "/admin",
    element: <SimpleAdminLogin />
  },
  {
    path: "/admin/dashboard",
    element: <SimpleAdminDashboard />
  }
]);

createRoot(document.getElementById('root')).render(
  <StrictMode>
    <AdminDataProvider>
      <CartProvider>
        <RouterProvider router={router} />
      </CartProvider>
    </AdminDataProvider>
  </StrictMode>,
)

```

```javascriptreact
import { StrictMode } from 'react'
import { createRoot } from 'react-dom/client'
import { createBrowserRouter, RouterProvider } from 'react-router-dom'
import './index.css'
import App from './App.jsx'
import Home from './pages/Home.jsx'
import CatalogPage from './pages/CatalogPage.jsx'
import ProductPage from './pages/ProductPage.jsx'
import Cart from './pages/Cart.jsx'
import About from './pages/About.jsx'
import Promotions from './pages/Promotions.jsx'
import SimpleAdminLogin from './pages/admin/SimpleAdminLogin.jsx'
import AdvancedAdminDashboard from './pages/admin/AdvancedAdminDashboard.jsx'
import AdminOverviewAdvanced from './pages/admin/AdminOverviewAdvanced.jsx'
import CategoryManagement from './pages/admin/CategoryManagement.jsx'
import { CartProvider } from './context/CartContext.jsx'
import { AdminDataProvider } from './context/AdminDataContext.jsx'

const router = createBrowserRouter([
  {
    path: "/",
    element: <App />,
    children: [
      {
        index: true,
        element: <Home />
      },
      {
        path: "catalog",
        element: <CatalogPage />
      },
      {
        path: "product/:id",
        element: <ProductPage />
      },
      {
        path: "cart",
        element: <Cart />
      },
      {
        path: "about",
        element: <About />
      },
      {
        path: "promotions",
        element: <Promotions />
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    path: "/admin",
    element: <SimpleAdminLogin />
  },
  {
    path: "/admin/dashboard",
    element: <AdvancedAdminDashboard />,
    children: [
      {
        index: true,
        element: <AdminOverviewAdvanced />
      },
      {
        path: "categories",
        element: <CategoryManagement />
      }
    ]
  }
]);

createRoot(document.getElementById('root')).render(
  <StrictMode>
    <AdminDataProvider>
      <CartProvider>
        <RouterProvider router={router} />
      </CartProvider>
    </AdminDataProvider>
  </StrictMode>,
)
```

```javascriptreact
import { StrictMode } from 'react'
import { createRoot } from 'react-dom/client'
import { createBrowserRouter, RouterProvider } from 'react-router-dom'
import './index.css'
import App from './App.jsx'
import Home from './pages/Home.jsx'
import CatalogPage from './pages/CatalogPage.jsx'
import ProductPage from './pages/ProductPage.jsx'
import Cart from './pages/Cart.jsx'
import About from './pages/About.jsx'
import Promotions from './pages/Promotions.jsx'
import SimpleAdminLogin from './pages/admin/SimpleAdminLogin.jsx'
```
```javascriptreact
import TestAdminComponent from './pages/admin/TestAdminComponent.jsx'
import { CartProvider } from './context/CartContext.jsx'

const router = createBrowserRouter([
  {
    path: "/",
    element: <App />,
    children: [
      {
        index: true,
        element: <Home />
      },
      {
        path: "catalog",
        element: <CatalogPage />
      },
      {
        path: "product/:id",
        element: <ProductPage />
      },
      {
        path: "cart",
        element: <Cart />
      },
      {
        path: "about",
        element: <About />
      },
      {
        path: "promotions",
        element: <Promotions />
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    path: "/admin",
    element: <SimpleAdminLogin />
```
```javascriptreact
  },
  {
    path: "/admin/test",
    element: <TestAdminComponent />
  }
]);

createRoot(document.getElementById('root')).render(
  <StrictMode>
    <AdminDataProvider>
      <CartProvider>
        <RouterProvider router={router} />
      </CartProvider>
    </AdminDataProvider>
  </StrictMode>,
)
```

### **–®–∞–≥ 2: –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—é –Ω–æ–≤—ã–π AdminDataContext**

```javascriptreact
import React, { createContext, useContext, useState } from 'react';
import { 
  categoryStructure, 
  initialProducts, 
  initialBrands, 
  initialPromotions, 
  initialAboutContent 
} from '../data/initialData.js';

const AdminDataContext = createContext();

export const useAdminData = () => {
  const context = useContext(AdminDataContext);
  if (!context) {
    throw new Error('useAdminData must be used within AdminDataProvider');
  }
  return context;
};

export const AdminDataProvider = ({ children }) => {
  // –°–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö
  const [products, setProducts] = useState(() => {
    const saved = localStorage.getItem('adminProducts');
    return saved ? JSON.parse(saved) : initialProducts;
  });

  const [categories, setCategories] = useState(() => {
    const saved = localStorage.getItem('adminCategories');
    return saved ? JSON.parse(saved) : categoryStructure;
  });

  const [brands, setBrands] = useState(() => {
    const saved = localStorage.getItem('adminBrands');
    return saved ? JSON.parse(saved) : initialBrands;
  });

  const [promotions, setPromotions] = useState(() => {
    const saved = localStorage.getItem('adminPromotions');
    return saved ? JSON.parse(saved) : initialPromotions;
  });

  const [aboutContent, setAboutContent] = useState(() => {
    const saved = localStorage.getItem('adminAboutContent');
    return saved ? JSON.parse(saved) : initialAboutContent;
  });

  // –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–∞–º–∏
  const addProduct = (product) => {
    const newProduct = {
      ...product,
      id: Math.max(...products.map(p => p.id)) + 1
    };
    const updatedProducts = [...products, newProduct];
    setProducts(updatedProducts);
    localStorage.setItem('adminProducts', JSON.stringify(updatedProducts));
  };

  const updateProduct = (id, updatedProduct) => {
    const updatedProducts = products.map(product => 
      product.id === id ? { ...product, ...updatedProduct } : product
    );
    setProducts(updatedProducts);
    localStorage.setItem('adminProducts', JSON.stringify(updatedProducts));
  };

  const deleteProduct = (id) => {
    const updatedProducts = products.filter(product => product.id !== id);
    setProducts(updatedProducts);
    localStorage.setItem('adminProducts', JSON.stringify(updatedProducts));
  };

  // –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—è–º–∏
  const addCategory = (categoryName, subcategories = []) => {
    const updatedCategories = {
      ...categories,
      [categoryName]: subcategories
    };
    setCategories(updatedCategories);
    localStorage.setItem('adminCategories', JSON.stringify(updatedCategories));
  };

  const updateCategory = (oldName, newName, subcategories) => {
    const updatedCategories = { ...categories };
    delete updatedCategories[oldName];
    updatedCategories[newName] = subcategories;
    setCategories(updatedCategories);
    localStorage.setItem('adminCategories', JSON.stringify(updatedCategories));
  };

  const deleteCategory = (categoryName) => {
    const updatedCategories = { ...categories };
    delete updatedCategories[categoryName];
    setCategories(updatedCategories);
    localStorage.setItem('adminCategories', JSON.stringify(updatedCategories));
  };

  // –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –±—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–∞–º–∏
  const addBrand = (brandName) => {
    if (!brands.includes(brandName)) {
      const updatedBrands = [...brands, brandName];
      setBrands(updatedBrands);
      localStorage.setItem('adminBrands', JSON.stringify(updatedBrands));
    }
  };

  const deleteBrand = (brandName) => {
    const updatedBrands = brands.filter(brand => brand !== brandName);
    setBrands(updatedBrands);
    localStorage.setItem('adminBrands', JSON.stringify(updatedBrands));
  };

  // –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∞–∫—Ü–∏—è–º–∏
  const addPromotion = (promotion) => {
    const newPromotion = {
      ...promotion,
      id: Math.max(...promotions.map(p => p.id)) + 1
    };
    const updatedPromotions = [...promotions, newPromotion];
    setPromotions(updatedPromotions);
    localStorage.setItem('adminPromotions', JSON.stringify(updatedPromotions));
  };

  const updatePromotion = (id, updatedPromotion) => {
    const updatedPromotions = promotions.map(promo => 
      promo.id === id ? { ...promo, ...updatedPromotion } : promo
    );
    setPromotions(updatedPromotions);
    localStorage.setItem('adminPromotions', JSON.stringify(updatedPromotions));
  };

  const deletePromotion = (id) => {
    const updatedPromotions = promotions.filter(promo => promo.id !== id);
    setPromotions(updatedPromotions);
    localStorage.setItem('adminPromotions', JSON.stringify(updatedPromotions));
  };

  // –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—è –¥–ª—è –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ "–û –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏"
  const updateAboutContent = (newContent) => {
    setAboutContent(newContent);
    localStorage.setItem('adminAboutContent', JSON.stringify(newContent));
  };

  const value = {
    // –î–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ
    products,
    categories,
    brands,
    promotions,
    aboutContent,
    
    // –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–æ–≤
    addProduct,
    updateProduct,
    deleteProduct,
    
    // –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–π
    addCategory,
    updateCategory,
    deleteCategory,
    
    // –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –±—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–æ–≤
    addBrand,
    deleteBrand,
    
    // –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –∞–∫—Ü–∏–π
    addPromotion,
    updatePromotion,
    deletePromotion,
    
    // –§—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—è –¥–ª—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–µ–Ω—Ç–∞
    updateAboutContent
  };

  return (
    <AdminDataContext.Provider value={value}>
      {children}
    </AdminDataContext.Provider>
  );
};
```

### **–®–∞–≥ 3: –û–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª—è—é Catalog.jsx –¥–ª—è –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è AdminDataContext**

```javascriptreact
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import { FaCheckCircle, FaTimesCircle, FaShoppingCart } from 'react-icons/fa';
import { useCartActions } from './hooks/useCartActions';
import { useAdminData } from './context/AdminDataContext';
import './Catalog.css';

export default function Catalog() {
  const { products, categories, brands } = useAdminData();
  const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('–í—Å–µ');
  const [selectedSubcategory, setSelectedSubcategory] = useState('–í—Å–µ');
  const [selectedBrand, setSelectedBrand] = useState('–í—Å–µ');
  const [priceRange, setPriceRange] = useState([0, 200000]);
  const [inStock, setInStock] = useState(false);
  const { addToCartWithNotification } = useCartActions();

  // –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–µ–º —Å–ø–∏—Å–æ–∫ –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–π –∏ –±—Ä–µ–Ω–¥–æ–≤
  const categoryList = ['–í—Å–µ', ...Object.keys(categories)];
  const brandList = ['–í—Å–µ', ...brands];

  const minPrice = 0;
  const maxPrice = 200000;

  // –ü–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –≤—ã–±—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–π –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
  const availableSubcategories = selectedCategory === '–í—Å–µ' 
    ? [] 
    : ['–í—Å–µ', ...(categoryStructure[selectedCategory] || [])];

  // –°–±—Ä–æ—Å –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏ –ø—Ä–∏ —Å–º–µ–Ω–µ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–π –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
  const handleCategoryChange = (category) => {
    setSelectedCategory(category);
    setSelectedSubcategory('–í—Å–µ');
  };

  const filteredProducts = initialProducts.filter((product) => {
    const byCategory = selectedCategory === '–í—Å–µ' || product.category === selectedCategory;
    const bySubcategory = selectedSubcategory === '–í—Å–µ' || product.subcategory === selectedSubcategory;
    const byBrand = selectedBrand === '–í—Å–µ' || product.brand === selectedBrand;
    const byPrice = product.price >= priceRange[0] && product.price <= priceRange[1];
    const byStock = !inStock || product.available;
    return byCategory && bySubcategory && byBrand && byPrice && byStock;
  });

  const handleAddToCart = (product, e) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    e.stopPropagation();
    addToCartWithNotification(product, 1);
  };

  return (
    <div className="catalog-wrapper">
      <aside className="catalog-filters">
        <h3>–§–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä—ã</h3>
        <div className="filter-group">
          <label>–ö–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—è</label>
          <select value={selectedCategory} onChange={e => handleCategoryChange(e.target.value)}>
            {categories.map(cat => (
              <option key={cat} value={cat}>{cat}</option>
            ))}
          </select>
        </div>
        {availableSubcategories.length > 0 && (
          <div className="filter-group">
            <label>–ü–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—è</label>
            <select value={selectedSubcategory} onChange={e => setSelectedSubcategory(e.target.value)}>
              {availableSubcategories.map(subcat => (
                <option key={subcat} value={subcat}>{subcat}</option>
              ))}
            </select>
          </div>
        )}
        <div className="filter-group">
          <label>–ü—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å</label>
          <select value={selectedBrand} onChange={e => setSelectedBrand(e.target.value)}>
            {brands.map(brand => (
              <option key={brand} value={brand}>{brand}</option>
            ))}
          </select>
        </div>
        <div className="filter-group">
          <label>–¶–µ–Ω–∞, ‚ÇΩ</label>
          <div className="price-range">
            <input
              type="number"
              min={minPrice}
              max={priceRange[1]}
              value={priceRange[0]}
              onChange={e => setPriceRange([+e.target.value, priceRange[1]])}
            />
            <span>-</span>
            <input
              type="number"
              min={priceRange[0]}
              max={maxPrice}
              value={priceRange[1]}
              onChange={e => setPriceRange([priceRange[0], +e.target.value])}
            />
          </div>
        </div>
        <div className="filter-group">
          <label>
            <input
              type="checkbox"
              checked={inStock}
              onChange={e => setInStock(e.target.checked)}
            />
            –¢–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏
          </label>
        </div>
      </aside>
      <main className="catalog-main">
        <h2>–ö–∞—Ç–∞–ª–æ–≥ —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–æ–≤</h2>
        <div className="catalog-grid">
          {filteredProducts.length === 0 && <div className="no-products">–ù–µ—Ç —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–æ–≤ –ø–æ –≤—ã–±—Ä–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º —Ñ–∏–ª—å—Ç—Ä–∞–º</div>}
          {filteredProducts.map(product => (
            <Link to={`/product/${product.id}`} className="catalog-card" key={product.id}>
              <div className="catalog-card-image">
                <span className="catalog-card-icon">{product.icon}</span>
              </div>

                <div className="catalog-card-category">
                  <span className="category">{product.category}</span>
                  {product.subcategory && <span className="subcategory"> ‚Üí {product.subcategory}</span>}
                </div>
                <div className="catalog-card-meta">
                  <span className="catalog-card-brand">{product.brand}</span>
                  <span className={product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}>
                    {product.available ? <FaCheckCircle /> : <FaTimesCircle />} {product.available ? '–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏' : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
                  </span>
                </div>
                <button 
                  className="catalog-card-btn"
                  onClick={(e) => handleAddToCart(product, e)}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                >
                  <FaShoppingCart /> –í –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É
                </button>
              </div>
            </Link>
          ))}
        </div>
      </main>
    </div>
  );
}
```

```javascriptreact
        <div className="filter-group">

            ))}

        <div className="filter-group">

        <div className="filter-group">

            –¢–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏
          </label>
        </div>
      </aside>
      <main className="catalog-main">
        <h2>–ö–∞—Ç–∞–ª–æ–≥ —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–æ–≤</h2>
        <div className="catalog-grid">

          {filteredProducts.map(product => (
            <Link to={`/product/${product.id}`} className="catalog-card" key={product.id}>
              <div className="catalog-card-image">
                <span className="catalog-card-icon">{product.icon}</span>
              </div>
              <div className="catalog-card-info">

                <div className="catalog-card-category">

                </div>
                <div className="catalog-card-meta">
                  <span className="catalog-card-brand">{product.brand}</span>
                  <span className={product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}>
                    {product.available ? <FaCheckCircle /> : <FaTimesCircle />} {product.available ? '–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏' : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
                  </span>
                </div>
                <button 
                  className="catalog-card-btn"
                  onClick={(e) => handleAddToCart(product, e)}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                >
                  <FaShoppingCart /> –í –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É

              </div>
            </Link>
          ))}
        </div>
      </main>
    </div>
  );
}
```

```javascriptreact
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { useAdminData } from '../../context/AdminDataContext';
import { FaPlus, FaEdit, FaTrash, FaSave, FaTimes } from 'react-icons/fa';
import './ProductManagement.css';

export default function ProductManagement() {
  const { products, categories, brands, addProduct, updateProduct, deleteProduct } = useAdminData();
  const [editingProduct, setEditingProduct] = useState(null);
  const [isCreating, setIsCreating] = useState(false);
  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    title: '',
    price: 0,
    category: '',
    subcategory: '',
    brand: '',
    available: true,
    icon: '',
    description: ''
  });

  const categoryList = Object.keys(categories);

  const handleInputChange = (e) => {
    const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target;
    setFormData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value
    }));
  };

  const handleCategoryChange = (e) => {
    const selectedCategory = e.target.value;
    setFormData(prev => ({
      ...prev,
      category: selectedCategory,
      subcategory: '' // –°–±—Ä–∞—Å—ã–≤–∞–µ–º –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—é –ø—Ä–∏ —Å–º–µ–Ω–µ –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏–∏
    }));
  };

  const startCreating = () => {
    setIsCreating(true);
    setEditingProduct(null);
    setFormData({
      title: '',
      price: 0,
      category: '',
      subcategory: '',
      brand: '',
      available: true,
      icon: '',
      description: ''
    });
  };

  const startEditing = (product) => {
    setEditingProduct(product.id);
    setIsCreating(false);
    setFormData({ ...product });
  };

  const cancelEditing = () => {
    setEditingProduct(null);
    setIsCreating(false);
    setFormData({
      title: '',
      price: 0,
      category: '',
      subcategory: '',
      brand: '',
      available: true,
      icon: '',
      description: ''
    });
  };

  const saveProduct = () => {
    if (!formData.title || !formData.category) {
      alert('–ó–∞–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ –æ–±—è–∑–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –ø–æ–ª—è!');
      return;
    }

    if (isCreating) {
      addProduct(formData);
      alert('–¢–æ–≤–∞—Ä —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω!');
    } else {
      updateProduct(editingProduct, formData);
      alert('–¢–æ–≤–∞—Ä –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω!');
    }
    
    cancelEditing();
  };

  const handleDelete = (id) => {
    if (window.confirm('–£–¥–∞–ª–∏—Ç—å —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä?')) {
      deleteProduct(id);
      alert('–¢–æ–≤–∞—Ä —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω!');
    }
  };

  const availableSubcategories = formData.category ? categories[formData.category] || [] : [];

  return (
    <div className="product-management">
      <div className="management-header">
        <h2>–£–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–∞–º–∏</h2>
        <button onClick={startCreating} className="btn-primary">
          <FaPlus /> –î–æ–±–∞–≤–∏—Ç—å —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä
        </button>
      </div>

      {(isCreating || editingProduct) && (
        <div className="product-form">
          <h3>{isCreating ? '–°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–∞' : '–†–µ–¥–∞–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–∞'}</h3>
          <div className="form-grid">
            <div className="form-group">
              <label>–ù–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ *</label>
              <input
                type="text"
                name="title"
                value={formData.title}
                onChange={handleInputChange}
                placeholder="–ù–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–∞"
              />
            </div>

            <div className="form-group">
              <label>–¶–µ–Ω–∞ *</label>
              <input
                type="number"
                name="price"
                value={formData.price}
                onChange={handleInputChange}
                min="0"
              />
            </div>

            <div className="form-group">
              <label>–ö–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—è *</label>
              <select
                name="category"
                value={formData.category}
                onChange={handleCategoryChange}
              >
                <option value="">–í—ã–±–µ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ –∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—é</option>
                {categoryList.map(cat => (
                  <option key={cat} value={cat}>{cat}</option>
                ))}
              </select>
            </div>

            <div className="form-group">
              <label>–ü–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—è</label>
              <select
                name="subcategory"
                value={formData.subcategory}
                onChange={handleInputChange}
                disabled={!formData.category}
              >
                <option value="">–í—ã–±–µ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ –ø–æ–¥–∫–∞—Ç–µ–≥–æ—Ä–∏—é</option>
                {availableSubcategories.map(subcat => (
                  <option key={subcat} value={subcat}>{subcat}</option>
                ))}
              </select>
            </div>

            <div className="form-group">
              <label>–ü—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å</label>
              <select
                name="brand"
                value={formData.brand}
                onChange={handleInputChange}
              >
                <option value="">–í—ã–±–µ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—è</option>
                {brands.map(brand => (
                  <option key={brand} value={brand}>{brand}</option>
                ))}
              </select>
            </div>

            <div className="form-group">
              <label>–ò–∫–æ–Ω–∫–∞</label>
              <input
                type="text"
                name="icon"
                value={formData.icon}
```
