                }
                return <span className="product-icon">{mainImage || 'üì¶'}</span>;
              })()}
              <div className="product-info">
                <div className="product-name">{product.title}</div>
                <div className="product-price">{product.price.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</div>
                <div className="product-quantity">–ö–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ: {product.quantity || 0} —à—Ç.</div>
              </div>
              <div className={`product-status ${product.available ? 'available' : 'unavailable'}`}>
                {product.available ? '–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏' : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
              </div>

            </div>
          )}
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );

  const renderContent = () => {

      case 'overview':

          <p>–ê–¥–º–∏–Ω –ø–∞–Ω–µ–ª—å</p>

        <nav className="sidebar-nav">

      <main className="admin-main">

          </h1>
          <div className="header-actions">

          </div>
        </header>
        
        <div className="admin-content">
          {renderContent()}
        </div>
      </main>
    </div>
  );
}

export default AdvancedAdminDashboard;

function ProductPage() {
  const { id } = useParams();
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const { addToCartWithNotification } = useCartActions();
  const [selectedImageIndex, setSelectedImageIndex] = useState(0);
  const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1);
  const [isWishlisted, setIsWishlisted] = useState(false);

  const product = productsData[id];

  if (!product) {
    return (
      <div className="product-not-found">
        <h2>–¢–æ–≤–∞—Ä –Ω–µ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω</h2>
        <button onClick={() => navigate('/catalog')} className="back-button">

        </button>
      </div>
    );
  }

  const handleAddToCart = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
  };

    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
    navigate('/cart');
  };

  return (
    <motion.div 
      className="product-page"
      initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
      animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
      transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}
    >
      <div className="container">
        <button 
          onClick={() => navigate(-1)} 
          className="back-button"
        >
          <FaArrowLeft /> –ù–∞–∑–∞–¥
        </button>

        <div className="product-content">
          <div className="product-images">
            <div className="main-image">
              <motion.div 
                className="image-placeholder"
                whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }}
                transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
              >
                <span className="product-icon">{product.icon}</span>
              </motion.div>
            </div>
            
            {product.images && product.images.length > 1 && (
              <div className="image-thumbnails">
                {product.images.map((_, index) => (
                  <button
                    key={index}
                    className={`thumbnail ${selectedImageIndex === index ? 'active' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(index)}
                  >
                    <span className="product-icon">{product.icon}</span>
                  </button>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          <div className="product-info">
            <div className="product-header">
              <h1>{product.title}</h1>
              <button 
                className={`wishlist-button ${isWishlisted ? 'active' : ''}`}
                onClick={() => setIsWishlisted(!isWishlisted)}
              >
                <FaHeart />
              </button>
            </div>

            <div className="product-meta">
              <span className="brand">{product.brand}</span>
              <span className="category">{product.category}</span>
              <span className={`availability ${product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}`}>
                {product.available ? <FaCheckCircle /> : <FaTimesCircle />}
                {product.available ? `–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏: ${product.inStock} —à—Ç` : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
              </span>
            </div>

            <div className="product-price">
              <span className="current-price">{product.price.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              {product.originalPrice && (
                <span className="original-price">{product.originalPrice.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              )}
            </div>

            <div className="product-description">
              <p>{product.description}</p>
            </div>

            <div className="product-features">
              <h3>–ü—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞:</h3>
              <ul>
                {product.features.map((feature, index) => (
                  <li key={index}>{feature}</li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>

            <div className="product-actions">
              <div className="quantity-selector">
                <label>–ö–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ:</label>
                <div className="quantity-controls">
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(Math.max(1, quantity - 1))}
                    disabled={quantity <= 1}
                  >
                    -
                  </button>
                  <span>{quantity}</span>
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(quantity + 1)}
                    disabled={quantity >= product.inStock}
                  >
                    +
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="action-buttons">
                <motion.button 
                  className="add-to-cart-btn"
                  onClick={handleAddToCart}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  <FaShoppingCart /> –í –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É
                </motion.button>

                <motion.button 
                  className="buy-now-btn"
                  onClick={handleBuyNow}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  –ö—É–ø–∏—Ç—å —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å
                </motion.button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="product-specifications">
          <h3>–¢–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ö–∞—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–µ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏</h3>
          <div className="specs-grid">
            {Object.entries(product.specifications).map(([key, value]) => (
              <div key={key} className="spec-item">
                <span className="spec-label">{key}:</span>
                <span className="spec-value">{value}</span>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </motion.div>
  );
}

export default ProductPage;

function ProductPage() {
  const { id } = useParams();
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const { addToCartWithNotification } = useCartActions();
  const { products } = useAdminData();
  const [selectedImageIndex, setSelectedImageIndex] = useState(0);
  const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1);
  const [isWishlisted, setIsWishlisted] = useState(false);

  const product = products.find(p => p.id === parseInt(id));

  if (!product) {
    return (
      <div className="product-not-found">
        <h2>–¢–æ–≤–∞—Ä –Ω–µ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω</h2>
        <button onClick={() => navigate('/catalog')} className="back-button">
          –í–µ—Ä–Ω—É—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ –∫–∞—Ç–∞–ª–æ–≥
        </button>

  const migratedProduct = migrateProductImages(product);
  const allImages = getAllImages(migratedProduct);

  const handleAddToCart = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
  };

  const handleBuyNow = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
    navigate('/cart');
  };

  return (
    <motion.div 
      className="product-page"
      initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
      animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
      transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}
    >
      <div className="container">
        <button 
          onClick={() => navigate(-1)} 
          className="back-button"
        >
          <FaArrowLeft /> –ù–∞–∑–∞–¥
        </button>

        <div className="product-content">
          <div className="product-images">
            <div className="main-image">
              <motion.div 
                className="image-placeholder"
                whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }}
                transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
              >
                <span className="product-icon">{product.icon}</span>
              </motion.div>
            </div>
            
            {product.images && product.images.length > 1 && (
              <div className="image-thumbnails">
                {product.images.map((_, index) => (
                  <button
                    key={index}
                    className={`thumbnail ${selectedImageIndex === index ? 'active' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(index)}
                  >
                    <span className="product-icon">{product.icon}</span>
                  </button>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          <div className="product-info">
            <div className="product-header">
              <h1>{product.title}</h1>
              <button 
                className={`wishlist-button ${isWishlisted ? 'active' : ''}`}
                onClick={() => setIsWishlisted(!isWishlisted)}
              >
                <FaHeart />
              </button>
            </div>

            <div className="product-meta">
              <span className="brand">{product.brand}</span>
              <span className="category">{product.category}</span>
              <span className={`availability ${product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}`}>
                {product.available ? <FaCheckCircle /> : <FaTimesCircle />}
                {product.available ? `–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏: ${product.inStock} —à—Ç` : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
              </span>
            </div>

            <div className="product-price">
              <span className="current-price">{product.price.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              {product.originalPrice && (
                <span className="original-price">{product.originalPrice.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              )}
            </div>

            <div className="product-description">
              <p>{product.description}</p>
            </div>

            <div className="product-features">
              <h3>–ü—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞:</h3>
              <ul>
                {product.features.map((feature, index) => (
                  <li key={index}>{feature}</li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>

            <div className="product-actions">
              <div className="quantity-selector">
                <label>–ö–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ:</label>
                <div className="quantity-controls">
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(Math.max(1, quantity - 1))}
                    disabled={quantity <= 1}
                  >
                    -
                  </button>
                  <span>{quantity}</span>
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(quantity + 1)}
                    disabled={quantity >= product.inStock}
                  >
                    +
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="action-buttons">
                <motion.button 
                  className="add-to-cart-btn"
                  onClick={handleAddToCart}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  <FaShoppingCart /> –í –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É
                </motion.button>

                <motion.button 
                  className="buy-now-btn"
                  onClick={handleBuyNow}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  –ö—É–ø–∏—Ç—å —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å
                </motion.button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="product-specifications">
          <h3>–¢–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ö–∞—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–µ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏</h3>
          <div className="specs-grid">
            {Object.entries(product.specifications).map(([key, value]) => (
              <div key={key} className="spec-item">
                <span className="spec-label">{key}:</span>
                <span className="spec-value">{value}</span>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </motion.div>
  );
}

export default ProductPage;

    ]

function ProductPage() {
  const { id } = useParams();
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const { addToCartWithNotification } = useCartActions();
  const { products } = useAdminData();
  const [selectedImageIndex, setSelectedImageIndex] = useState(0);
  const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1);
  const [isWishlisted, setIsWishlisted] = useState(false);

  const product = products.find(p => p.id === parseInt(id));

  if (!product) {
    return (
      <div className="product-not-found">
        <h2>–¢–æ–≤–∞—Ä –Ω–µ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω</h2>
        <button onClick={() => navigate('/catalog')} className="back-button">
          –í–µ—Ä–Ω—É—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ –∫–∞—Ç–∞–ª–æ–≥
        </button>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // –ú–∏–≥—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –∏ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º –≤—Å–µ –∏–∑–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–∞
  const migratedProduct = migrateProductImages(product);
  const allImages = getAllImages(migratedProduct);

  const handleAddToCart = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
  };

  const handleBuyNow = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
    navigate('/cart');
  };

  return (
    <motion.div 
      className="product-page"
      initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
      animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
      transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}
    >
      <div className="container">
        <button 
          onClick={() => navigate(-1)} 
          className="back-button"
        >
          <FaArrowLeft /> –ù–∞–∑–∞–¥
        </button>

        <div className="product-content">
          <div className="product-images">
            <div className="main-image">
              <motion.div 
                className="image-container"
                whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }}
                transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
              >
                {allImages.length > 0 && allImages[selectedImageIndex] ? (
                  allImages[selectedImageIndex].data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                    <img 
                      src={allImages[selectedImageIndex].data} 
                      alt={product.title}
                      className="product-main-image"
                    />
                  ) : (
                    <span className="product-icon">{allImages[selectedImageIndex].data}</span>
                  )
                ) : (
                  <span className="product-icon">üì¶</span>
                )}
              </motion.div>
              
              {allImages.length > 1 && (
                <div className="image-navigation">
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button prev"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === 0 ? allImages.length - 1 : selectedImageIndex - 1)}
                    disabled={allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronLeft />
                  </button>
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button next"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === allImages.length - 1 ? 0 : selectedImageIndex + 1)}
                    disabled={allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronRight />
                  </button>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
            
            {allImages.length > 1 && (
              <div className="image-thumbnails">
                {allImages.map((image, index) => (
                  <button
                    key={index}
                    className={`thumbnail ${selectedImageIndex === index ? 'active' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(index)}
                  >
                    {image.data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                      <img src={image.data} alt={`${product.title} ${index + 1}`} />
                    ) : (
                      <span className="product-icon">{image.data}</span>
                    )}
                  </button>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          <div className="product-info">
            <div className="product-header">
              <h1>{product.title}</h1>
              <button 
                className={`wishlist-button ${isWishlisted ? 'active' : ''}`}
                onClick={() => setIsWishlisted(!isWishlisted)}
              >
                <FaHeart />
              </button>
            </div>

            <div className="product-meta">
              <span className="brand">{product.brand}</span>
              <span className="category">{product.category}</span>
              <span className={`availability ${product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}`}>
                {product.available ? <FaCheckCircle /> : <FaTimesCircle />}
                {product.available ? `–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏: ${product.inStock} —à—Ç` : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
              </span>
            </div>

            <div className="product-price">
              <span className="current-price">{product.price.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              {product.originalPrice && (
                <span className="original-price">{product.originalPrice.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              )}
            </div>

            <div className="product-description">
              <p>{product.description}</p>
            </div>

            <div className="product-features">
              <h3>–ü—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞:</h3>
              <ul>
                {product.features.map((feature, index) => (
                  <li key={index}>{feature}</li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>

            <div className="product-actions">
              <div className="quantity-selector">
                <label>–ö–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ:</label>
                <div className="quantity-controls">
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(Math.max(1, quantity - 1))}
                    disabled={quantity <= 1}
                  >
                    -
                  </button>
                  <span>{quantity}</span>
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(quantity + 1)}
                    disabled={quantity >= product.inStock}
                  >
                    +
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="action-buttons">
                <motion.button 
                  className="add-to-cart-btn"
                  onClick={handleAddToCart}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  <FaShoppingCart /> –í –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É
                </motion.button>

                <motion.button 
                  className="buy-now-btn"
                  onClick={handleBuyNow}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  –ö—É–ø–∏—Ç—å —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å
                </motion.button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="product-specifications">
          <h3>–¢–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ö–∞—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–µ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏</h3>
          <div className="specs-grid">
            {Object.entries(product.specifications).map(([key, value]) => (
              <div key={key} className="spec-item">
                <span className="spec-label">{key}:</span>
                <span className="spec-value">{value}</span>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </motion.div>
  );
}

export default ProductPage;

```javascript
// –£—Ç–∏–ª–∏—Ç—ã –¥–ª—è —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å –∏–∑–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è–º–∏ —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–æ–≤

// –ú–∏–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—ã—Ö –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö: icon -> images
export const migrateProductImages = (product) => {
  // –ï—Å–ª–∏ —É —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–∞ —É–∂–µ –µ—Å—Ç—å images, –≤–æ–∑–≤—Ä–∞—â–∞–µ–º –∫–∞–∫ –µ—Å—Ç—å
  if (product.images && Array.isArray(product.images)) {
    return product;
  }
  
  // –ï—Å–ª–∏ –µ—Å—Ç—å —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ icon, —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–µ–º –º–∞—Å—Å–∏–≤ images
  if (product.icon) {
    return {
      ...product,
      images: [
        {
          id: 1,
          data: product.icon,
          isMain: true
        }
      ]
    };
  }
  
  // –ï—Å–ª–∏ –Ω–µ—Ç –Ω–∏ images, –Ω–∏ icon, —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–µ–º –ø—É—Å—Ç–æ–π –º–∞—Å—Å–∏–≤
  return {
    ...product,
    images: []
  };
};

// –ü–æ–ª—É—á–∏—Ç—å –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω–æ–µ –∏–∑–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–∞
export const getMainImage = (product) => {
  const migratedProduct = migrateProductImages(product);
  const mainImage = migratedProduct.images.find(img => img.isMain);
  return mainImage ? mainImage.data : null;
};

// –ü–æ–ª—É—á–∏—Ç—å –≤—Å–µ –∏–∑–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–∞
export const getAllImages = (product) => {
  const migratedProduct = migrateProductImages(product);
  return migratedProduct.images || [];
};

// –ü—Ä–æ–≤–µ—Ä–∏—Ç—å, —è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –ª–∏ –∏–∑–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ Base64
export const isBase64Image = (data) => {
  return typeof data === 'string' && data.startsWith('data:image');
};

// –ü–æ–ª—É—á–∏—Ç—å –æ—Ç–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–∞–µ–º–æ–µ –∏–∑–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ (–≤–æ–∑–≤—Ä–∞—â–∞–µ—Ç –æ–±—ä–µ–∫—Ç —Å —Ç–∏–ø–æ–º –∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏)
export const getDisplayImageInfo = (imageData) => {
  if (isBase64Image(imageData)) {
    return {
      type: 'image',
      data: imageData
    };
  }
  return {
    type: 'icon',
    data: imageData || 'üì¶'
  };
};

function ProductPage() {
  const { id } = useParams();
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const { addToCartWithNotification } = useCartActions();
  const { products } = useAdminData();
  const [selectedImageIndex, setSelectedImageIndex] = useState(0);
  const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1);
  const [isWishlisted, setIsWishlisted] = useState(false);

  const product = products.find(p => p.id === parseInt(id));

  if (!product) {
    return (
      <div className="product-not-found">
        <h2>–¢–æ–≤–∞—Ä –Ω–µ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω</h2>
        <button onClick={() => navigate('/catalog')} className="back-button">
          –í–µ—Ä–Ω—É—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ –∫–∞—Ç–∞–ª–æ–≥
        </button>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // –ú–∏–≥—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –∏ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º –≤—Å–µ –∏–∑–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–∞
  const migratedProduct = migrateProductImages(product);
  const allImages = getAllImages(migratedProduct) || [];

  const handleAddToCart = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
  };

  const handleBuyNow = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
    navigate('/cart');
  };

  return (
    <motion.div 
      className="product-page"
      initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
      animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
      transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}
    >
      <div className="container">
        <button 
          onClick={() => navigate(-1)} 
          className="back-button"
        >
          <FaArrowLeft /> –ù–∞–∑–∞–¥
        </button>

        <div className="product-content">
          <div className="product-images">
            <div className="main-image">
              <motion.div 
                className="image-container"
                whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }}
                transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
              >
                {allImages.length > 0 && allImages[selectedImageIndex] ? (
                  allImages[selectedImageIndex].data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                    <img 
                      src={allImages[selectedImageIndex].data} 
                      alt={product.title}
                      className="product-main-image"
                    />
                  ) : (
                    <span className="product-icon">{allImages[selectedImageIndex].data}</span>
                  )
                ) : (
                  <span className="product-icon">üì¶</span>
                )}
              </motion.div>
              
              {allImages.length > 1 && (
                <div className="image-navigation">
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button prev"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === 0 ? allImages.length - 1 : selectedImageIndex - 1)}
                    disabled={allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronLeft />
                  </button>
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button next"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === allImages.length - 1 ? 0 : selectedImageIndex + 1)}
                    disabled={allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronRight />
                  </button>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
            
            {allImages.length > 1 && (
              <div className="image-thumbnails">
                {allImages.map((image, index) => (
                  <button
                    key={index}
                    className={`thumbnail ${selectedImageIndex === index ? 'active' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(index)}
                  >
                    {image.data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                      <img src={image.data} alt={`${product.title} ${index + 1}`} />
                    ) : (
                      <span className="product-icon">{image.data}</span>
                    )}
                  </button>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          <div className="product-info">
            <div className="product-header">
              <h1>{product.title}</h1>
              <button 
                className={`wishlist-button ${isWishlisted ? 'active' : ''}`}
                onClick={() => setIsWishlisted(!isWishlisted)}
              >
                <FaHeart />
              </button>
            </div>

            <div className="product-meta">
              <span className="brand">{product.brand}</span>
              <span className="category">{product.category}</span>
              <span className={`availability ${product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}`}>
                {product.available ? <FaCheckCircle /> : <FaTimesCircle />}
                {product.available ? `–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏: ${product.inStock} —à—Ç` : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
              </span>
            </div>

            <div className="product-price">
              <span className="current-price">{product.price.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              {product.originalPrice && (
                <span className="original-price">{product.originalPrice.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              )}
            </div>

            <div className="product-description">
              <p>{product.description}</p>
            </div>

            <div className="product-features">
              <h3>–ü—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞:</h3>
              <ul>
                {product.features.map((feature, index) => (
                  <li key={index}>{feature}</li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>

            <div className="product-actions">
              <div className="quantity-selector">
                <label>–ö–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ:</label>
                <div className="quantity-controls">
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(Math.max(1, quantity - 1))}
                    disabled={quantity <= 1}
                  >
                    -
                  </button>
                  <span>{quantity}</span>
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(quantity + 1)}
                    disabled={quantity >= product.inStock}
                  >
                    +
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="action-buttons">
                <motion.button 
                  className="add-to-cart-btn"
                  onClick={handleAddToCart}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  <FaShoppingCart /> –í –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É
                </motion.button>

                <motion.button 
                  className="buy-now-btn"
                  onClick={handleBuyNow}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  –ö—É–ø–∏—Ç—å —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å
                </motion.button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="product-specifications">
          <h3>–¢–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ö–∞—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–µ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏</h3>
          <div className="specs-grid">
            {Object.entries(product.specifications).map(([key, value]) => (
              <div key={key} className="spec-item">
                <span className="spec-label">{key}:</span>
                <span className="spec-value">{value}</span>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </motion.div>
  );
}

export default ProductPage;

function ProductPage() {
  const { id } = useParams();
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const { addToCartWithNotification } = useCartActions();
  const { products } = useAdminData();
  const [selectedImageIndex, setSelectedImageIndex] = useState(0);
  const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1);
  const [isWishlisted, setIsWishlisted] = useState(false);

  const product = products.find(p => p.id === parseInt(id));

  if (!product) {
    return (
      <div className="product-not-found">
        <h2>–¢–æ–≤–∞—Ä –Ω–µ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω</h2>
        <button onClick={() => navigate('/catalog')} className="back-button">
          –í–µ—Ä–Ω—É—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ –∫–∞—Ç–∞–ª–æ–≥
        </button>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // –ú–∏–≥—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –∏ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º –≤—Å–µ –∏–∑–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–∞
  const migratedProduct = migrateProductImages(product);
  const allImages = getAllImages(migratedProduct) || [];

  const handleAddToCart = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
  };

  const handleBuyNow = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
    navigate('/cart');
  };

  return (
    <motion.div 
      className="product-page"
      initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
      animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
      transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}
    >
      <div className="container">
        <button 
          onClick={() => navigate(-1)} 
          className="back-button"
        >
          <FaArrowLeft /> –ù–∞–∑–∞–¥
        </button>

        <div className="product-content">
          <div className="product-images">
            <div className="main-image">
              <motion.div 
                className="image-container"
                whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }}
                transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
              >
                {allImages.length > 0 && allImages[selectedImageIndex] ? (
                  allImages[selectedImageIndex].data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                    <img 
                      src={allImages[selectedImageIndex].data} 
                      alt={product.title}
                      className="product-main-image"
                    />
                  ) : (
                    <span className="product-icon">{allImages[selectedImageIndex].data}</span>
                  )
                ) : (
                  <span className="product-icon">üì¶</span>
                )}
              </motion.div>
              
              {allImages.length > 1 && (
                <div className="image-navigation">
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button prev"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === 0 ? allImages.length - 1 : selectedImageIndex - 1)}
                    disabled={allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronLeft />
                  </button>
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button next"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === allImages.length - 1 ? 0 : selectedImageIndex + 1)}
                    disabled={allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronRight />
                  </button>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
            
            {allImages && allImages.length > 1 && (
              <div className="image-thumbnails">
                {allImages.map((image, index) => (
                  <button
                    key={index}
                    className={`thumbnail ${selectedImageIndex === index ? 'active' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(index)}
                  >
                    {image.data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                      <img src={image.data} alt={`${product.title} ${index + 1}`} />
                    ) : (
                      <span className="product-icon">{image.data}</span>
                    )}
                  </button>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          <div className="product-info">
            <div className="product-header">
              <h1>{product.title}</h1>
              <button 
                className={`wishlist-button ${isWishlisted ? 'active' : ''}`}
                onClick={() => setIsWishlisted(!isWishlisted)}
              >
                <FaHeart />
              </button>
            </div>

            <div className="product-meta">
              <span className="brand">{product.brand}</span>
              <span className="category">{product.category}</span>
              <span className={`availability ${product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}`}>
                {product.available ? <FaCheckCircle /> : <FaTimesCircle />}
                {product.available ? `–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏: ${product.inStock} —à—Ç` : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
              </span>
            </div>

            <div className="product-price">
              <span className="current-price">{product.price.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              {product.originalPrice && (
                <span className="original-price">{product.originalPrice.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              )}
            </div>

            <div className="product-description">
              <p>{product.description}</p>
            </div>

            <div className="product-features">
              <h3>–ü—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞:</h3>
              <ul>
                {product.features.map((feature, index) => (
                  <li key={index}>{feature}</li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>

            <div className="product-actions">
              <div className="quantity-selector">
                <label>–ö–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ:</label>
                <div className="quantity-controls">
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(Math.max(1, quantity - 1))}
                    disabled={quantity <= 1}
                  >
                    -
                  </button>
                  <span>{quantity}</span>
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(quantity + 1)}
                    disabled={quantity >= product.inStock}
                  >
                    +
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="action-buttons">
                <motion.button 
                  className="add-to-cart-btn"
                  onClick={handleAddToCart}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  <FaShoppingCart /> –í –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É
                </motion.button>

                <motion.button 
                  className="buy-now-btn"
                  onClick={handleBuyNow}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  –ö—É–ø–∏—Ç—å —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å
                </motion.button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="product-specifications">
          <h3>–¢–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ö–∞—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–µ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏</h3>
          <div className="specs-grid">
            {Object.entries(product.specifications).map(([key, value]) => (
              <div key={key} className="spec-item">
                <span className="spec-label">{key}:</span>
                <span className="spec-value">{value}</span>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </motion.div>
  );
}

export default ProductPage;

function ProductPage() {
  const { id } = useParams();
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const { addToCartWithNotification } = useCartActions();
  const { products } = useAdminData();
  const [selectedImageIndex, setSelectedImageIndex] = useState(0);
  const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1);
  const [isWishlisted, setIsWishlisted] = useState(false);

  const product = products.find(p => p.id === parseInt(id));

  if (!product) {
    return (
      <div className="product-not-found">
        <h2>–¢–æ–≤–∞—Ä –Ω–µ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω</h2>
        <button onClick={() => navigate('/catalog')} className="back-button">
          –í–µ—Ä–Ω—É—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ –∫–∞—Ç–∞–ª–æ–≥
        </button>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // –ú–∏–≥—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –∏ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º –≤—Å–µ –∏–∑–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–∞
  const migratedProduct = migrateProductImages(product);
  const allImages = getAllImages(migratedProduct) || [];

  const handleAddToCart = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
  };

  const handleBuyNow = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
    navigate('/cart');
  };

  return (
    <motion.div 
      className="product-page"
      initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
      animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
      transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}
    >
      <div className="container">
        <button 
          onClick={() => navigate(-1)} 
          className="back-button"
        >
          <FaArrowLeft /> –ù–∞–∑–∞–¥
        </button>

        <div className="product-content">
          <div className="product-images">
            <div className="main-image">
              <motion.div 
                className="image-container"
                whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }}
                transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
              >
                {allImages && allImages.length > 0 && allImages[selectedImageIndex] ? (
                  allImages[selectedImageIndex].data && allImages[selectedImageIndex].data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                    <img 
                      src={allImages[selectedImageIndex].data} 
                      alt={product.title}
                      className="product-main-image"
                    />
                  ) : (
                    <span className="product-icon">{allImages[selectedImageIndex]?.data || 'üì¶'}</span>
                  )
                ) : (
                  <span className="product-icon">üì¶</span>
                )}
              </motion.div>
              
              {allImages.length > 1 && (
                <div className="image-navigation">
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button prev"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === 0 ? allImages.length - 1 : selectedImageIndex - 1)}
                    disabled={allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronLeft />
                  </button>
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button next"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === allImages.length - 1 ? 0 : selectedImageIndex + 1)}
                    disabled={allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronRight />
                  </button>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
            
            {allImages && allImages.length > 1 && (
              <div className="image-thumbnails">
                {allImages.map((image, index) => (
                  <button
                    key={index}
                    className={`thumbnail ${selectedImageIndex === index ? 'active' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(index)}
                  >
                    {image.data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                      <img src={image.data} alt={`${product.title} ${index + 1}`} />
                    ) : (
                      <span className="product-icon">{image.data}</span>
                    )}
                  </button>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          <div className="product-info">
            <div className="product-header">
              <h1>{product.title}</h1>
              <button 
                className={`wishlist-button ${isWishlisted ? 'active' : ''}`}
                onClick={() => setIsWishlisted(!isWishlisted)}
              >
                <FaHeart />
              </button>
            </div>

            <div className="product-meta">
              <span className="brand">{product.brand}</span>
              <span className="category">{product.category}</span>
              <span className={`availability ${product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}`}>
                {product.available ? <FaCheckCircle /> : <FaTimesCircle />}
                {product.available ? `–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏: ${product.inStock} —à—Ç` : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
              </span>
            </div>

            <div className="product-price">
              <span className="current-price">{product.price.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              {product.originalPrice && (
                <span className="original-price">{product.originalPrice.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              )}
            </div>

            <div className="product-description">
              <p>{product.description}</p>
            </div>

            <div className="product-features">
              <h3>–ü—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞:</h3>
              <ul>
                {product.features.map((feature, index) => (
                  <li key={index}>{feature}</li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>

            <div className="product-actions">
              <div className="quantity-selector">
                <label>–ö–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ:</label>
                <div className="quantity-controls">
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(Math.max(1, quantity - 1))}
                    disabled={quantity <= 1}
                  >
                    -
                  </button>
                  <span>{quantity}</span>
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(quantity + 1)}
                    disabled={quantity >= product.inStock}
                  >
                    +
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="action-buttons">
                <motion.button 
                  className="add-to-cart-btn"
                  onClick={handleAddToCart}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  <FaShoppingCart /> –í –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É
                </motion.button>

                <motion.button 
                  className="buy-now-btn"
                  onClick={handleBuyNow}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  –ö—É–ø–∏—Ç—å —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å
                </motion.button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="product-specifications">
          <h3>–¢–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ö–∞—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–µ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏</h3>
          <div className="specs-grid">
            {Object.entries(product.specifications).map(([key, value]) => (
              <div key={key} className="spec-item">
                <span className="spec-label">{key}:</span>
                <span className="spec-value">{value}</span>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </motion.div>
  );
}

export default ProductPage;

function ProductPage() {
  const { id } = useParams();
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const { addToCartWithNotification } = useCartActions();
  const { products } = useAdminData();
  const [selectedImageIndex, setSelectedImageIndex] = useState(0);
  const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1);
  const [isWishlisted, setIsWishlisted] = useState(false);

  const product = products.find(p => p.id === parseInt(id));

  if (!product) {
    return (
      <div className="product-not-found">
        <h2>–¢–æ–≤–∞—Ä –Ω–µ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω</h2>
        <button onClick={() => navigate('/catalog')} className="back-button">
          –í–µ—Ä–Ω—É—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ –∫–∞—Ç–∞–ª–æ–≥
        </button>
      </div>
    );
  }

  // –ú–∏–≥—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ–º –∏ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º –≤—Å–µ –∏–∑–æ–±—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç–æ–≤–∞—Ä–∞
  const migratedProduct = migrateProductImages(product);
  const allImages = getAllImages(migratedProduct) || [];

  const handleAddToCart = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
  };

  const handleBuyNow = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
    navigate('/cart');
  };

  return (
    <motion.div 
      className="product-page"
      initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
      animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
      transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}
    >
      <div className="container">
        <button 
          onClick={() => navigate(-1)} 
          className="back-button"
        >
          <FaArrowLeft /> –ù–∞–∑–∞–¥
        </button>

        <div className="product-content">
          <div className="product-images">
            <div className="main-image">
              <motion.div 
                className="image-container"
                whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }}
                transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
              >
                {allImages && allImages.length > 0 && allImages[selectedImageIndex] ? (
                  allImages[selectedImageIndex].data && allImages[selectedImageIndex].data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                    <img 
                      src={allImages[selectedImageIndex].data} 
                      alt={product.title}
                      className="product-main-image"
                    />
                  ) : (
                    <span className="product-icon">{allImages[selectedImageIndex]?.data || 'üì¶'}</span>
                  )
                ) : (
                  <span className="product-icon">üì¶</span>
                )}
              </motion.div>
              
              {allImages && allImages.length > 1 && (
                <div className="image-navigation">
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button prev"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === 0 ? allImages.length - 1 : selectedImageIndex - 1)}
                    disabled={!allImages || allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronLeft />
                  </button>
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button next"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === allImages.length - 1 ? 0 : selectedImageIndex + 1)}
                    disabled={!allImages || allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronRight />
                  </button>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
            
            {allImages && allImages.length > 1 && (
              <div className="image-thumbnails">
                {allImages.map((image, index) => (
                  <button
                    key={index}
                    className={`thumbnail ${selectedImageIndex === index ? 'active' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(index)}
                  >
                    {image.data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                      <img src={image.data} alt={`${product.title} ${index + 1}`} />
                    ) : (
                      <span className="product-icon">{image.data}</span>
                    )}
                  </button>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          <div className="product-info">
            <div className="product-header">
              <h1>{product.title}</h1>
              <button 
                className={`wishlist-button ${isWishlisted ? 'active' : ''}`}
                onClick={() => setIsWishlisted(!isWishlisted)}
              >
                <FaHeart />
              </button>
            </div>

            <div className="product-meta">
              <span className="brand">{product.brand}</span>
              <span className="category">{product.category}</span>
              <span className={`availability ${product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}`}>
                {product.available ? <FaCheckCircle /> : <FaTimesCircle />}
                {product.available ? `–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏: ${product.inStock} —à—Ç` : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
              </span>
            </div>

            <div className="product-price">
              <span className="current-price">{product.price.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              {product.originalPrice && (
                <span className="original-price">{product.originalPrice.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              )}
            </div>

            <div className="product-description">
              <p>{product.description}</p>
            </div>

            <div className="product-features">
              <h3>–ü—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞:</h3>
              <ul>
                {product.features.map((feature, index) => (
                  <li key={index}>{feature}</li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>

            <div className="product-actions">
              <div className="quantity-selector">
                <label>–ö–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ:</label>
                <div className="quantity-controls">
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(Math.max(1, quantity - 1))}
                    disabled={quantity <= 1}
                  >
                    -
                  </button>
                  <span>{quantity}</span>
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(quantity + 1)}
                    disabled={quantity >= product.inStock}
                  >
                    +
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="action-buttons">
                <motion.button 
                  className="add-to-cart-btn"
                  onClick={handleAddToCart}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  <FaShoppingCart /> –í –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É
                </motion.button>

                <motion.button 
                  className="buy-now-btn"
                  onClick={handleBuyNow}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  –ö—É–ø–∏—Ç—å —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å
                </motion.button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="product-specifications">
          <h3>–¢–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ö–∞—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–µ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏</h3>
          <div className="specs-grid">
            {Object.entries(product.specifications).map(([key, value]) => (
              <div key={key} className="spec-item">
                <span className="spec-label">{key}:</span>
                <span className="spec-value">{value}</span>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </motion.div>
  );
}

export default ProductPage;

function ProductPage() {
  const { id } = useParams();
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const { addToCartWithNotification } = useCartActions();
  const { products } = useAdminData();
  const [selectedImageIndex, setSelectedImageIndex] = useState(0);
  const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1);
  const [isWishlisted, setIsWishlisted] = useState(false);

  const product = products.find(p => p.id === parseInt(id));

  if (!product) {
    return (
      <div className="product-not-found">
        <h2>–¢–æ–≤–∞—Ä –Ω–µ –Ω–∞–π–¥–µ–Ω</h2>
        <button onClick={() => navigate('/catalog')} className="back-button">

        </button>
      </div>

  }

  const migratedProduct = migrateProductImages(product);
  const allImages = getAllImages(migratedProduct) || [];

  const handleAddToCart = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
  };

  const handleBuyNow = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
    navigate('/cart');
  };

  return (
    <motion.div 
      className="product-page"
      initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
      animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
      transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}
    >
      <div className="container">
        <button 
          onClick={() => navigate(-1)} 
          className="back-button"
        >
          <FaArrowLeft /> –ù–∞–∑–∞–¥
        </button>

        <div className="product-content">
          <div className="product-images">
            <div className="main-image">
              <motion.div 
                className="image-container"
                whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }}
                transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
              >
                {allImages && allImages.length > 0 && allImages[selectedImageIndex] ? (
                  allImages[selectedImageIndex].data && allImages[selectedImageIndex].data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                    <img 
                      src={allImages[selectedImageIndex].data} 
                      alt={product.title}
                      className="product-main-image"
                    />
                  ) : (
                    <span className="product-icon">{allImages[selectedImageIndex]?.data || 'üì¶'}</span>
                  )
                ) : (
                  <span className="product-icon">üì¶</span>
                )}
              </motion.div>
              
              {allImages && allImages.length > 1 && (
                <div className="image-navigation">
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button prev"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === 0 ? allImages.length - 1 : selectedImageIndex - 1)}
                    disabled={!allImages || allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronLeft />
                  </button>
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button next"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === allImages.length - 1 ? 0 : selectedImageIndex + 1)}
                    disabled={!allImages || allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronRight />
                  </button>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
            
            {allImages && allImages.length > 1 && (
              <div className="image-thumbnails">
                {allImages.map((image, index) => (
                  <button
                    key={index}
                    className={`thumbnail ${selectedImageIndex === index ? 'active' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(index)}
                  >
                    {image && image.data && image.data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                      <img src={image.data} alt={`${product.title} ${index + 1}`} />
                    ) : (
                      <span className="product-icon">{image?.data || 'üì¶'}</span>
                    )}
                  </button>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          <div className="product-info">
            <div className="product-header">
              <h1>{product.title}</h1>
              <button 
                className={`wishlist-button ${isWishlisted ? 'active' : ''}`}
                onClick={() => setIsWishlisted(!isWishlisted)}
              >
                <FaHeart />
              </button>
            </div>

            <div className="product-meta">
              <span className="brand">{product.brand}</span>
              <span className="category">{product.category}</span>
              <span className={`availability ${product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}`}>
                {product.available ? <FaCheckCircle /> : <FaTimesCircle />}
                {product.available ? `–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏: ${product.inStock} —à—Ç` : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
              </span>
            </div>

            <div className="product-price">
              <span className="current-price">{product.price.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              {product.originalPrice && (
                <span className="original-price">{product.originalPrice.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              )}
            </div>

            <div className="product-description">
              <p>{product.description}</p>
            </div>

            <div className="product-features">
              <h3>–ü—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞:</h3>
              <ul>
                {product.features.map((feature, index) => (
                  <li key={index}>{feature}</li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>

            <div className="product-actions">
              <div className="quantity-selector">
                <label>–ö–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ:</label>
                <div className="quantity-controls">
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(Math.max(1, quantity - 1))}
                    disabled={quantity <= 1}
                  >
                    -
                  </button>
                  <span>{quantity}</span>
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(quantity + 1)}
                    disabled={quantity >= product.inStock}
                  >
                    +
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="action-buttons">
                <motion.button 
                  className="add-to-cart-btn"
                  onClick={handleAddToCart}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  <FaShoppingCart /> –í –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É
                </motion.button>

                <motion.button 
                  className="buy-now-btn"
                  onClick={handleBuyNow}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  –ö—É–ø–∏—Ç—å —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å
                </motion.button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="product-specifications">
          <h3>–¢–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ö–∞—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–µ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏</h3>
          <div className="specs-grid">
            {Object.entries(product.specifications).map(([key, value]) => (
              <div key={key} className="spec-item">
                <span className="spec-label">{key}:</span>
                <span className="spec-value">{value}</span>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </motion.div>
  );
}

export default ProductPage;

function ProductPage() {
  const { id } = useParams();
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const { addToCartWithNotification } = useCartActions();
  const { products } = useAdminData();
  const [selectedImageIndex, setSelectedImageIndex] = useState(0);
  
  // –ë–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å: —É–±–µ–∂–¥–∞–µ–º—Å—è —á—Ç–æ selectedImageIndex –≤ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–∞—Ö –º–∞—Å—Å–∏–≤–∞
  const safeSelectedIndex = Math.max(0, Math.min(selectedImageIndex, allImages ? allImages.length - 1 : 0));
  const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1);
  const [isWishlisted, setIsWishlisted] = useState(false);

  const product = products.find(p => p.id === parseInt(id));

  if (!product) {
    return (
      <div className="product-not-found">

        <button onClick={() => navigate('/catalog')} className="back-button">

        </button>

  const migratedProduct = migrateProductImages(product);
  const allImages = getAllImages(migratedProduct) || [];

  const handleAddToCart = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
  };

  const handleBuyNow = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
    navigate('/cart');
  };

  return (
    <motion.div 
      className="product-page"
      initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
      animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
      transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}
    >
      <div className="container">
        <button 
          onClick={() => navigate(-1)} 
          className="back-button"
        >
          <FaArrowLeft /> –ù–∞–∑–∞–¥
        </button>

        <div className="product-content">
          <div className="product-images">
            <div className="main-image">
              <motion.div 
                className="image-container"
                whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }}
                transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
              >
                {allImages && allImages.length > 0 && allImages[selectedImageIndex] ? (
                  allImages[selectedImageIndex].data && allImages[selectedImageIndex].data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                    <img 
                      src={allImages[selectedImageIndex].data} 
                      alt={product.title}
                      className="product-main-image"
                    />
                  ) : (
                    <span className="product-icon">{allImages[selectedImageIndex]?.data || 'üì¶'}</span>
                  )
                ) : (
                  <span className="product-icon">üì¶</span>
                )}
              </motion.div>
              
              {allImages && allImages.length > 1 && (
                <div className="image-navigation">
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button prev"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === 0 ? allImages.length - 1 : selectedImageIndex - 1)}
                    disabled={!allImages || allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronLeft />
                  </button>
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button next"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === allImages.length - 1 ? 0 : selectedImageIndex + 1)}
                    disabled={!allImages || allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronRight />
                  </button>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
            
            {allImages && allImages.length > 1 && (
              <div className="image-thumbnails">
                {allImages.map((image, index) => (
                  <button
                    key={index}
                    className={`thumbnail ${selectedImageIndex === index ? 'active' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(index)}
                  >
                    {image && image.data && image.data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                      <img src={image.data} alt={`${product.title} ${index + 1}`} />
                    ) : (
                      <span className="product-icon">{image?.data || 'üì¶'}</span>
                    )}
                  </button>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          <div className="product-info">
            <div className="product-header">
              <h1>{product.title}</h1>
              <button 
                className={`wishlist-button ${isWishlisted ? 'active' : ''}`}
                onClick={() => setIsWishlisted(!isWishlisted)}
              >
                <FaHeart />
              </button>
            </div>

            <div className="product-meta">
              <span className="brand">{product.brand}</span>
              <span className="category">{product.category}</span>
              <span className={`availability ${product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}`}>
                {product.available ? <FaCheckCircle /> : <FaTimesCircle />}
                {product.available ? `–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏: ${product.inStock} —à—Ç` : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
              </span>
            </div>

            <div className="product-price">
              <span className="current-price">{product.price.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              {product.originalPrice && (
                <span className="original-price">{product.originalPrice.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              )}
            </div>

            <div className="product-description">
              <p>{product.description}</p>
            </div>

            <div className="product-features">
              <h3>–ü—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞:</h3>
              <ul>
                {product.features.map((feature, index) => (
                  <li key={index}>{feature}</li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>

            <div className="product-actions">
              <div className="quantity-selector">
                <label>–ö–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ:</label>
                <div className="quantity-controls">
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(Math.max(1, quantity - 1))}
                    disabled={quantity <= 1}
                  >
                    -
                  </button>
                  <span>{quantity}</span>
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(quantity + 1)}
                    disabled={quantity >= product.inStock}
                  >
                    +
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="action-buttons">
                <motion.button 
                  className="add-to-cart-btn"
                  onClick={handleAddToCart}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  <FaShoppingCart /> –í –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É
                </motion.button>

                <motion.button 
                  className="buy-now-btn"
                  onClick={handleBuyNow}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  –ö—É–ø–∏—Ç—å —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å
                </motion.button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="product-specifications">
          <h3>–¢–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ö–∞—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–µ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏</h3>
          <div className="specs-grid">
            {Object.entries(product.specifications).map(([key, value]) => (
              <div key={key} className="spec-item">
                <span className="spec-label">{key}:</span>
                <span className="spec-value">{value}</span>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </motion.div>
  );
}

export default ProductPage;

function ProductPage() {
  const { id } = useParams();
  const navigate = useNavigate();
  const { addToCartWithNotification } = useCartActions();
  const { products } = useAdminData();
  const [selectedImageIndex, setSelectedImageIndex] = useState(0);
  const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1);
  const [isWishlisted, setIsWishlisted] = useState(false);

  const product = products.find(p => p.id === parseInt(id));

  if (!product) {
    return (

  const migratedProduct = migrateProductImages(product);
  const allImages = getAllImages(migratedProduct) || [];
  
  // –ë–µ–∑–æ–ø–∞—Å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å: —É–±–µ–∂–¥–∞–µ–º—Å—è —á—Ç–æ selectedImageIndex –≤ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–∞—Ö –º–∞—Å—Å–∏–≤–∞
  const safeSelectedIndex = Math.max(0, Math.min(selectedImageIndex, allImages.length - 1));

  const handleAddToCart = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
  };

  const handleBuyNow = () => {
    addToCartWithNotification(product, quantity);
    navigate('/cart');
  };

  return (
    <motion.div 
      className="product-page"
      initial={{ opacity: 0 }}
      animate={{ opacity: 1 }}
      transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}
    >
      <div className="container">
        <button 
          onClick={() => navigate(-1)} 
          className="back-button"
        >
          <FaArrowLeft /> –ù–∞–∑–∞–¥
        </button>

        <div className="product-content">
          <div className="product-images">
            <div className="main-image">
              <motion.div 
                className="image-container"
                whileHover={{ scale: 1.05 }}
                transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
              >
                {allImages && allImages.length > 0 && allImages[selectedImageIndex] ? (
                  allImages[selectedImageIndex].data && allImages[selectedImageIndex].data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                    <img 
                      src={allImages[selectedImageIndex].data} 
                      alt={product.title}
                      className="product-main-image"
                    />
                  ) : (
                    <span className="product-icon">{allImages[selectedImageIndex]?.data || 'üì¶'}</span>
                  )
                ) : (
                  <span className="product-icon">üì¶</span>
                )}
              </motion.div>
              
              {allImages && allImages.length > 1 && (
                <div className="image-navigation">
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button prev"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === 0 ? allImages.length - 1 : selectedImageIndex - 1)}
                    disabled={!allImages || allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronLeft />
                  </button>
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button next"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === allImages.length - 1 ? 0 : selectedImageIndex + 1)}
                    disabled={!allImages || allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronRight />
                  </button>
                </div>
              )}
            </div>
            
            {allImages && allImages.length > 1 && (
              <div className="image-thumbnails">
                {allImages.map((image, index) => (
                  <button
                    key={index}
                    className={`thumbnail ${selectedImageIndex === index ? 'active' : ''}`}
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(index)}
                  >
                    {image && image.data && image.data.startsWith('data:image') ? (
                      <img src={image.data} alt={`${product.title} ${index + 1}`} />
                    ) : (
                      <span className="product-icon">{image?.data || 'üì¶'}</span>
                    )}
                  </button>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          <div className="product-info">
            <div className="product-header">
              <h1>{product.title}</h1>
              <button 
                className={`wishlist-button ${isWishlisted ? 'active' : ''}`}
                onClick={() => setIsWishlisted(!isWishlisted)}
              >
                <FaHeart />
              </button>
            </div>

            <div className="product-meta">
              <span className="brand">{product.brand}</span>
              <span className="category">{product.category}</span>
              <span className={`availability ${product.available ? 'in-stock' : 'out-of-stock'}`}>
                {product.available ? <FaCheckCircle /> : <FaTimesCircle />}
                {product.available ? `–í –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏: ${product.inStock} —à—Ç` : '–ù–µ—Ç –≤ –Ω–∞–ª–∏—á–∏–∏'}
              </span>
            </div>

            <div className="product-price">
              <span className="current-price">{product.price.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              {product.originalPrice && (
                <span className="original-price">{product.originalPrice.toLocaleString()} ‚ÇΩ</span>
              )}
            </div>

            <div className="product-description">
              <p>{product.description}</p>
            </div>

            <div className="product-features">
              <h3>–ü—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞:</h3>
              <ul>
                {product.features.map((feature, index) => (
                  <li key={index}>{feature}</li>
                ))}
              </ul>
            </div>

            <div className="product-actions">
              <div className="quantity-selector">
                <label>–ö–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ:</label>
                <div className="quantity-controls">
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(Math.max(1, quantity - 1))}
                    disabled={quantity <= 1}
                  >
                    -
                  </button>
                  <span>{quantity}</span>
                  <button 
                    onClick={() => setQuantity(quantity + 1)}
                    disabled={quantity >= product.inStock}
                  >
                    +
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <div className="action-buttons">
                <motion.button 
                  className="add-to-cart-btn"
                  onClick={handleAddToCart}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  <FaShoppingCart /> –í –∫–æ—Ä–∑–∏–Ω—É
                </motion.button>

                <motion.button 
                  className="buy-now-btn"
                  onClick={handleBuyNow}
                  disabled={!product.available}
                  whileHover={{ scale: 1.02 }}
                  whileTap={{ scale: 0.98 }}
                >
                  –ö—É–ø–∏—Ç—å —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å
                </motion.button>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div className="product-specifications">
          <h3>–¢–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–µ —Ö–∞—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–µ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏</h3>
          <div className="specs-grid">
            {Object.entries(product.specifications).map(([key, value]) => (
              <div key={key} className="spec-item">
                <span className="spec-label">{key}:</span>
                <span className="spec-value">{value}</span>
              </div>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </motion.div>
  );
}

export default ProductPage;

function ProductPage() {
  const { id } = useParams();

  const safeSelectedIndex = Math.max(0, Math.min(selectedImageIndex, allImages.length - 1));

  const handleAddToCart = () => {

  const handleBuyNow = () => {

  return (
    <motion.div

                    <FaChevronLeft />
                  </button>
                  <button 
                    className="nav-button next"
                    onClick={() => setSelectedImageIndex(selectedImageIndex === allImages.length - 1 ? 0 : selectedImageIndex + 1)}
                    disabled={!allImages || allImages.length <= 1}
                  >
                    <FaChevronRight />
                  </button>

            </div>

                >
                  –ö—É–ø–∏—Ç—å —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å

}
